T15D4345:156b-1: sha li ho tra ya y'am aa shva a'a yur bee dya sam hi ta n'a ma /
T15D4345:156b-3: rta'i tshe'i rig byed sha li ho tras bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T15D4345:156b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T15D4345:156b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla
T15D4345:156b-6: bee d'urya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
T15D4345:156b-7: // khyab 'jug gi ni btsun mo'i mchog / lha mo dpal mo rta yi mngal //
T15D4345:156b-8: phyag 'tshal nas ni rta rnams kyi //
T15D4345:156b-9: tshe yi rig byed rtogs bshad bya //
T15D4345:156b-10: gang las gang phyir gang don yin //

T15D4345:156b-12: kha ba can gyi byang phyogs na //
T15D4345:156b-13: lha yi dbang po'i gnas 'dra bar //
T15D4345:156b-14: sha li ho tra drang srong che //
T15D4345:156b-15: sbyin sreg byas nas 'dug pa'i tshe //
T15D4345:156b-16: legs thos thos pa phun tshogs ldan //
T15D4345:156b-17: bu yis pha la dris gyur pa //
T15D4345:156b-18: legs ldan chos rnams thams cad mkhyen //
T15D4345:156b-19: rta tshe'i rig byed mkhas lags na //
T15D4345:156b-20: rta rnams kyi ni gso ba 'di //
T15D4345:156b-21: ji ltar byung bar gyur pa lags //
T15D4345:156b-22: drang srong gzi brjid chen po yis //
T15D4345:156b-23: de la mnyan par gyis zhes smras //
T15D4345:156b-24: sngon tshe rta rnams rang dgar ni //
T15D4345:156b-25: mkha' la rgyu zhing gnas byed cing //
T15D4345:156b-26: zas dang spyod pa ci dga' bar //
T15D4345:156b-27: de rnams rang dgar spyod pa yin //
T15D4345:156b-28: thams cad la yang lus kyi ni //
T15D4345:156b-29: goms pas nad ni byung ma gyur //
T15D4345:156b-30: gang nas brtsams te nga yi bu //
T15D4345:156b-31: bzhon pa nyid du byas gyur pa //
T15D4345:156b-32: de nas brtsams te gnod byed pa'i //
T15D4345:156b-33: nad kun gyis nig zir ba yin //
T15D4345:156b-34: de nas de la sems gdung skyes //
T15D4345:156b-35: nga yis dka' thub chen po byas //
T15D4345:156b-36: tshangs pa lha ni mnyes byas nas //
T15D4345:156b-37: de yi gso ba rnyed pa yin //
T15D4345:156b-38: zug rngu lus kyi gso ba dang //
T15D4345:156b-39: de bzhin cha spyad nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:156b-40: rte'u yi ni gso ba dang //
T15D4345:156b-41: dug gi rang bzhin sman dang ni //
T15D4345:156b-42: bcud len gdon nad gso ba dang //
T15D4345:156b-43: ro tsa byed pa brgyad pa yin //
T15D4345:156b-44: de ltar rta yi tshe'i rig byed //
T15D4345:156b-45: 'di ni yan lag brgyad du bshad //
T15D4345:156b-46: yan lag brgyad po 'di yi gnas //
T15D4345:156b-47: rgyas par bu yis mnyan par gyis //
T15D4345:156b-48: mdo yi gnas ni dang po ste //
T15D4345:156b-49: de yi phyi ma gnyis pa yin //
T15D4345:156b-50: gsum pa 'dir ni lus yin la //
T15D4345:157a-2: lnga pa rte'u sman yin te //
T15D4345:157a-3: drug pa phyi ma'i phyi ma yin //

T15D4345:157a-8: le'u'i rim pa nges pa ni //
T15D4345:157a-9: gnas gnas su ni ngas bshad bya //
T15D4345:157a-10: tshe yi rig byed byung ba dang //
T15D4345:157a-11: de bzhin slob ma sbyang bu dang //
T15D4345:157a-12: nges pa'i tshig dang byung tshul dang //

T15D4345:157a-14: rang bzhin dang ni skye gnas dang //

T15D4345:157a-17: bshad pa dang ni tshad gzhal dang //
T15D4345:157a-18: yan lag bcu yi cha dbye dang //
T15D4345:157a-19: sdug dang mi sdug shes bya dang //
T15D4345:157a-20: tshad shes bya dang zas sbyor ba //
T15D4345:157a-21: mdzes dang mtshan gyi le'u dang //
T15D4345:157a-22: de bzhin kha dog shes bya dang //

T15D4345:157a-24: 'dren ma rgyal po'i bzhon pa dang //
T15D4345:157a-25: mig brtag pa dang so brtag pa //
T15D4345:157a-26: gtsug dang na tshod shes bya dang //
T15D4345:157a-27: tshe shes pa dang bcas pa dang //
T15D4345:157a-28: dri dang skad gsang brtag pa dang //
T15D4345:157a-30: rgyug pa brtag dang gra ma can //
T15D4345:157a-31: nyes pa che dang snying stobs brtag /
T15D4345:157a-32: gzi mdangs brtag dang rigs brtag dang //
T15D4345:157a-33: ston ka pa dang nyo 'tshong bcas //
T15D4345:157a-34: de ltar gnas ni dang po yi //
T15D4345:157a-35: le'u'i rim pa gnas pa yin /
T15D4345:157a-37: // / dri ba chen po nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:157a-38: de bzhin sgo nga las byung dang //
T15D4345:157a-39: rmen bu'i le'u gsum pa ste //
T15D4345:157a-40: nad shes bya ba rnam gsum dang ;

T15D4345:157a-52: khrag 'khrugs nad ni gso ba dang //

T15D4345:157b-0: @157b skye 'bru dbugs mi bde gso dang //
T15D4345:157b-1: dbugs mi bde ba lud pa can //
T15D4345:157b-2: sna rnag dang ni mngon par tsha //
T15D4345:157b-3: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan rims //
T15D4345:157b-4: 'dus pa las gyur rims gso dang //
T15D4345:157b-5: dus ni go bzlog las byung dang //
T15D4345:157b-6: snad pa las gyur rims dang ni //
T15D4345:157b-7: yid kyi rims ni gso ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-8: de bzhin 'khru ba mang po dang //
T15D4345:157b-9: sman khu'i gong bu'i sbyor ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-10: sbeg pa brtag pa'i le'u dang //
T15D4345:157b-11: de bzhin rnga ma'i nad gso dang //
T15D4345:157b-12: gzhang byung ba yi gso ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-13: khrag dang mkhris pa gso ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-14: so lhag byung ba gso ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-16: gdug pas zin pa'i mtshan nyid gso //
T15D4345:157b-17: smad pa'i mtshan nyid can le'u //
T15D4345:157b-18: dug gi shugs ni shes bya dang //
T15D4345:157b-19: de bzhin dug gis zin gso ba //
T15D4345:157b-20: dug mdas phog pa zhes bya ba //
T15D4345:157b-21: gnyis pa'i gnas su bsdus pa yin //
T15D4345:157b-22: mngal chags zhes pa'i le'u dang //
T15D4345:157b-23: de bzhin lus kyi rnam dbye dang ;

T15D4345:157b-28: nang gi bdag nyid can byung dang //
T15D4345:157b-29: bya dang bya min brtag pa dang //
T15D4345:157b-30: 'dir ni zas skom cho ga dang //
T15D4345:157b-31: de bzhin ljang pa'i ro yi tshogs ;
T15D4345:157b-32: / gso ba'i yan lag dbang byas dang //
T15D4345:157b-33: long dang lkugs sogs bstan pa dang //

T15D4345:157b-35: gzhan yang rma gnyis le'u dang //

T15D4345:157b-40: chu bur gso ba nyid dang ni //

T15D4345:157b-42: rlung nyen mngal gyi nyes pa dang //
T15D4345:157b-43: mngal du shi ba'i nad gso dang //

T15D4345:157b-48: sems khong chud par byed pa dang //

T15D4345:157b-51: aa ba tang ka'i gso ba dang //
T15D4345:157b-52: lce rings sna nad 'dzag byed dang //

T15D4345:158a-0: @158a * // de bzhin mkhris pa las gyur dang //

T15D4345:158a-5: mchi ma 'dzag pa gso ba dang //

T15D4345:158a-7: de bzhin kol nyes nad nyid dang //

T15D4345:158a-17: de bzhin mkhris pa las gyur dang //

T15D4345:158a-23: mkhris nad sbrang bu lta bu dang //

T15D4345:158a-25: chu 'dzin zhes bya'i nad dang ni //

T15D4345:158a-28: gzhan yang bad kan can snying nad //
T15D4345:158a-29: srin bu las gyur snying nad dang //
T15D4345:158a-30: rlung gi gzer dang lkog ma'i nad //
T15D4345:158a-31: snum chos nyes pa'i nad dang ni //

T15D4345:158a-33: de bzhin 'bru zos nyes pa dang //
T15D4345:158a-35: sbu bas las blud ni nyes pa dang //
T15D4345:158a-36: brdung nyes bzhon pa pos snad dang //
T15D4345:158a-37: lud pa gso dang mdze nad gso //
T15D4345:158a-38: gyen 'byung glo nad gso ba dang //
T15D4345:158a-39: dregs dang nyes pa gso ba dang //
T15D4345:158a-40: smyo nad gso dang mtshan mo bcom //
T15D4345:158a-41: gzhang 'brum gso dang rngo gso dang //
T15D4345:158a-42: de bzhin g-yan pa gso ba dang //
T15D4345:158a-43: skrangs nad gso ba nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:158a-44: gzhan yang ri bo can nad gso //
T15D4345:158a-45: yan lag phyogs gcig nad cong can //
T15D4345:158a-46: mgo 'khor chu yi rmu rdzing dang //
T15D4345:158a-47: chu lha'i gdon ni gso ba dang //

T15D4345:158a-50: chu bur can dang sngo mtshan nyid //
T15D4345:158a-51: ling tog can dang mchi ma 'dzag / ling nad ma 'dres mthong ba nyid //
T15D4345:158a-52: mig dmar dang ni mun dza can //
T15D4345:158b-0: mun dza'i dra ba can @158b gso dang //

T15D4345:158b-20: 'gram nad lce yi nad bcas dang //

T15D4345:158b-27: rte'u'i nad rnams gso ba yin /

T15D4345:158b-30: khang pa'i lha rnams mchod pa dang //

T15D4345:158b-35: mche ba chag pa'i ltas bstan dang //
T15D4345:158b-36: ltas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan bstan dang //
T15D4345:158b-37: zhi ba bskyed par bya ba rnams //

T15D4345:158b-39: dang por rjes btung cho ga ste //
T15D4345:158b-40: de log lan tshva'i cho ga yin //
T15D4345:158b-41: snum dang lan tshva chang dang 'bru //
T15D4345:158b-42: 'o ma chu dang sbubs las byung //
T15D4345:158b-43: gnod pa'i nad ni bdun po yi //
T15D4345:158b-44: nad gzhi gso bar bcas bstan dang //

T15D4345:158b-47: don grub ces bya'i til mar dang //
T15D4345:158b-48: me btsa'i las kyi cho ga dang //

T15D4345:158b-50: gtsags bu las gyur nad bstan dang //

T15D4345:158b-54: snum las gyur ba'i nad gso ba'i //

T15D4345:159a-0: @159a * // de rjes nad kyis 'chi ltas bstan //
T15D4345:159a-1: nad med 'chi ltas bstan pa dang //
T15D4345:159a-2: pho nya la sogs ltas bstan dang //

T15D4345:159a-27: de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin //
T15D4345:159a-28: sha li ho tra'i gnas dang po las tshe'i rig

T15D4345:159a-32: / de nas sha li ho tra yis //

T15D4345:159a-34: slob ma sbyang ba zhes bya ba //
T15D4345:159a-35: legs thos de bzhin nga las nyon //
T15D4345:159a-36: slob ma rigs bzang yan lag tshang //
T15D4345:159a-37: mtshan ldan dad par bcas pa bya //
T15D4345:159a-38: bram ze sogs gsum gang yang rung //
T15D4345:159a-39: gtsang ma bla mas slob tu gzhug / rta la shin tu brtse bas na //

T15D4345:159a-43: dmangs rigs rnams ni gso ba yis //
T15D4345:159a-44: 'tsho ba tshol bas de yang gzung //
T15D4345:159a-45: nyi ma byang 'gro bsod nams dus //
T15D4345:159a-46: gza' la mig dmar nyi ma dang //
T15D4345:159a-47: tshes drug brgyad dang lnga dang bcu //
T15D4345:159a-48: tshes bzhi tshes ni bcu bzhi dang //
T15D4345:159a-49: tshes gcig dang ni tshes dgu ni //
T15D4345:159a-50: rig pa rtsom la spang bar bya //
T15D4345:159a-51: tshes grangs lhag ma shis pa yin //
T15D4345:159a-52: gzhan yang skar ma pa las nyon //
T15D4345:159a-53: gang zhig 'jam dang myur ba dang //
T15D4345:159b-0: g-yo dang @159b gdug dang smin drug dang //
T15D4345:159b-1: tha skar ma gtogs mi rnams kyis //
T15D4345:159b-2: rig slob rtsom la rtag tu shis //
T15D4345:159b-3: skar ma yang ni 'di rnams dang //
T15D4345:159b-4: thang cig kyang ni shis ba dang //
T15D4345:159b-5: gza' ni ma smad pa rnams dang //
T15D4345:159b-6: chu tshod bzang la brtsam par bya //
T15D4345:159b-7: de lta'i dus ni shis pa la //
T15D4345:159b-8: slob ma gos gtsang bgos pa dang //
T15D4345:159b-9: bram ze mchod phyir thogs dkar btags //
T15D4345:159b-10: dri ni dkar pos byugs pa dang //
T15D4345:159b-11: phreng ba dkar btags mkhas pa dang //
T15D4345:159b-12: gos dkar bgos pa 'don du gzhug / de bzhin rgyal rigs rnams kyang ni //
T15D4345:159b-13: cha lugs thams cad dmar ba dang //
T15D4345:159b-14: de bzhin dmangs rigs thams cad ser //
T15D4345:159b-15: lha rnams thams cad byed du gzhug / bram ze yis ni tshangs pa mchod //
T15D4345:159b-16: rgyal rigs kyis ni brgya byin te //
T15D4345:159b-17: dmangs rigs kyis ni rlung lha mchod //
T15D4345:159b-18: bye brag med par kun gyis ni //
T15D4345:159b-19: dbyangs can de bzhin dpal mo dang //
T15D4345:159b-20: sha li ho tra mchod par bya //
T15D4345:159b-21: de rnams la ni me tog spos //
T15D4345:159b-22: kha zas phun tshogs kyis mchod nas //
T15D4345:159b-23: de yi 'og tu sa bi tra //
T15D4345:159b-24: me la mar gyis tshim par byas //
T15D4345:159b-25: bram ze rnams la kha zas sbyin //
T15D4345:159b-26: de nas bu gcig yon byas pas //
T15D4345:159b-27: slob dpon la ni yon byin te //
T15D4345:159b-28: sa phyogs dag cing brgyan pa ru ;
T15D4345:159b-29: / slob ma nub tu bltas nas ni //
T15D4345:159b-30: slob dpon shar du bltas te brjod //
T15D4345:159b-31: rtag tu las la brtson pa yi //
T15D4345:159b-32: bu khyod kyis ni bslab par bya //
T15D4345:159b-33: srog gis kyang ni bla ma dang /
T15D4345:159b-34: mnyes par bya na nor ci smos //
T15D4345:159b-35: bla ma bram ze sa bdag la //
T15D4345:159b-36: bu yis 'khu bar mi bya ste //
T15D4345:159b-37: khyod kyis rta rnams la yang ni //
T15D4345:159b-39: nga yi kha las gang thos pa //
T15D4345:159b-40: de ni bu yis 'bad de slobs //
T15D4345:159b-41: de bzhin phongs par gyur kyang ni //
T15D4345:159b-42: glegs bam las ni slob mi bya //
T15D4345:159b-43: glegs bam las ni gang bslabs de //
T15D4345:159b-45: dang po 'di dag thams cad ni //
T15D4345:159b-46: gso ba bu yis bslab par bya //
T15D4345:159b-47: ma bslabs pa ni spangs nas kyang //
T15D4345:159b-48: gang smras 'di ni mnyan par gyis //
T15D4345:159b-49: bco lnga gnyis dang bcu bzhi gnyis //
T15D4345:159b-50: tshes brgyad dang bcas sa 'gul dang //
T15D4345:159b-51: bu btsas shing drung nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:159b-52: mi gtsang bas ni khyab gnas dang //
T15D4345:160a-1: nyid mi gtsang ba nyid dang //
T15D4345:160a-2: nad kyis sems ni rmongs pa dang //
T15D4345:160a-3: rlung ni chen po rgyu ba dang //
T15D4345:160a-4: de bzhin 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i tshe //
T15D4345:160a-5: 'di bslab pa ni spang byas la //
T15D4345:160a-6: bu yis bstan bcos gzung bar bya //
T15D4345:160a-7: bstan bcos gzung ba byas nas ni //
T15D4345:160a-8: bstan bcos don ni gzung bar gyis ;
T15D4345:160a-9: / bstan bcos don ni gzung byas nas //
T15D4345:160a-10: de 'og las la goms par gyis //
T15D4345:160a-11: bstan bcos shes pa 'ba' zhig la //
T15D4345:160a-12: las kyi bya ba tsam mthong ba //
T15D4345:160a-13: gso ba'i las la 'jug par ni //
T15D4345:160a-14: de dag gnyi ga don med 'gyur //
T15D4345:160a-15: gso ba'i las la 'jug pa na //
T15D4345:160a-16: khyod kyis rta ni rtag tu skyongs //
T15D4345:160a-17: mi bzad nad kyis nyen na yang //
T15D4345:160a-18: khyod kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
T15D4345:160a-19: rta gang gsor ni mi rung ba //
T15D4345:160a-20: de yang rigs pas gso bar bya //
T15D4345:160a-21: ma gsos na ni nges par 'chi //
T15D4345:160a-22: gsos kyang nges pa med gyur pa'i //
T15D4345:160a-23: nad kyis gdungs par gyur pa gang //
T15D4345:160a-25: bstan bcos las de spang bar bshad //
T15D4345:160a-26: spang tshul de yang nga las nyon //
T15D4345:160a-27: de ni rta bres las ring bar //
T15D4345:160a-28: srung ma dang bcas gzhag par bya //
T15D4345:160a-29: na ba'i rta ni gang yang rung //
T15D4345:160a-30: gtan spang ba ni rigs ma yin //
T15D4345:160a-31: nad dang sbegs dang rgas pa'i rta //
T15D4345:160a-32: gtan spang bram ze gso dang mtshungs //
T15D4345:160a-33: rta ni mtshan nyid ngan gyur pa //
T15D4345:160a-34: nyo ba'i dus su blang mi bya //
T15D4345:160a-35: gang zhig rang gi khyim du skyes //
T15D4345:160a-36: bram ze gzhan yul pa la sbyin //
T15D4345:160a-37: ltas ngan byung bar gyur na ni //
T15D4345:160a-38: 'di nyid sbyin pa gtang bar bya //
T15D4345:160a-39: mi 'tshe ba ni tshe skyi mchog / sems can la brtag brtse bya zhing //
T15D4345:160a-40: de bas ci tsam gso nus pa //
T15D4345:160a-41: de tsam zhig ni gzhag par bya //
T15D4345:160a-42: bde bar 'jog par nus gyur las //
T15D4345:160a-44: rta ni sdug bsngal bar bzhag na //
T15D4345:160a-46: gzhan yang rgyal po'i sa skyong ba'i //
T15D4345:160a-47: bya ba rta la rag las pas ;
T15D4345:160a-48: / de la khyed kyis gus bya zhing //
T15D4345:160a-49: de bzhin slob dpon bla ma dang //
T15D4345:160a-50: bram ze la yang gus par bya //
T15D4345:160a-51: des ni khyed kyis dpal thob 'gyur //
T15D4345:160a-52: de las gzhan du byed na ni //
T15D4345:160a-53: ltung las nye bar ltung bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:160a-54: dmyal bar rang ni ltung ba dang //
T15D4345:160b-0: nges par ldan pa nyid du @160b 'gyur ;
T15D4345:160b-1: / dam pa'i lam la gnas na ni //
T15D4345:160b-2: grags dang bsod nams tshe ring dang //
T15D4345:160b-3: chos don 'dod pa ma lus pa'i //
T15D4345:160b-5: de skad brjod nas slob pa ma yis //
T15D4345:160b-6: khas blang de rjes slob dpon gyis //
T15D4345:160b-7: dus shis pa la ma yengs par //
T15D4345:160b-8: slob ma de ni slob tu gzhug / de yi 'og tu rgyun du ni //
T15D4345:160b-9: mkhas pa rtag tu brtson pa yin //
T15D4345:160b-10: bya ba ci bzhin rdzogs par du //
T15D4345:160b-11: slob ma de ni slob tu gzhug / de ltar rig pa byin pa yis //
T15D4345:160b-12: bla mas slob mar bslab pa yin //
T15D4345:160b-13: slob dpon dang ni slob ma dag /'dod 'jo ba ltar zad med 'gyur //
T15D4345:160b-14: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las slob ma sbyang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
T15D4345:160b-16: // / de nas sha li ho tras bu //
T15D4345:160b-17: legs thos la ni yang smras pa //
T15D4345:160b-18: gang phyir 'di ni dpal mo'i bu //
T15D4345:160b-19: de phyir mchog tu bkra shis yin //
T15D4345:160b-20: gzhan yang rta yi mchod sbyin la ;
T15D4345:160b-21: / rta ni dgos pa nyid yin pas //
T15D4345:160b-22: de bas shin tu dag byed de'ang //
T15D4345:160b-23: 'di ni bkra shis dam pa yin //
T15D4345:160b-24: ri dags dang ni thag ring 'gro //
T15D4345:160b-25: de bzhin g-yul gyi las rnams la'ang //
T15D4345:160b-26: rgyal po rgyal byed pa yi rgyu //
T15D4345:160b-27: rta las mchog gyur yod ma yin //
T15D4345:160b-28: rta yi mchod sbyin dag la ni ;
T15D4345:160b-29: / skye dgu'i bdag gis longs spyod cig / de bas mchod sbyin thams cad la //
T15D4345:160b-30: de ni spyad bya nyid yin no //
T15D4345:160b-31: de phyir shin tu gtsang bas na //
T15D4345:160b-32: kun la rjes su gnang ba yin //
T15D4345:160b-33: de phyir tshangs pa ma gtogs pa //
T15D4345:160b-34: thams cad kyi ni zas ma yin //
T15D4345:160b-35: rta yi mchod sbyin las lhag pa'i //
T15D4345:160b-36: dag byed mi la yod min pas //
T15D4345:160b-37: rta ma gtogs par sa gsum na //
T15D4345:160b-38: bkra shis mchog gzhan yod ma yin //
T15D4345:160b-39: rnag can myur 'gro lam las rgyal //
T15D4345:160b-42: dpal mo'i bur yang bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:160b-43: 'jig rten na ni sna che bas //
T15D4345:160b-44: de ni sna can zhes byar bshad //
T15D4345:160b-46: lam du rgyal bas lam las rgyal //
T15D4345:160b-48: dbang med khyer bas 'phrog byed de //
T15D4345:161a-1: rnams rdzogs par byed nus pas //
T15D4345:161a-2: las rdzogs zhes ni tshangs pas bshad //
T15D4345:161a-3: mgyogs pa dang ni mgyogs 'gro dang //
T15D4345:161a-4: de bzhin myur 'gro can zhes pa //
T15D4345:161a-5: de ni mgyogs pa kho nar bshad //
T15D4345:161a-6: 'di dag des tshig tshul yin no //
T15D4345:161a-7: rta ni dpal mo'i bu yin pas //
T15D4345:161a-8: dpal mo'i bu zhes bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:161a-9: mtshan dang rigs ni bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:161a-10: dpa' bos bzhon zhing byang ba yi //
T15D4345:161a-11: rta ni stong gis sa bzhi dag / ma lus pa las rgyal bar nus //
T15D4345:161a-12: mtshon thogs pa yis mi thub pa'i //
T15D4345:161a-13: gnas der stobs che ba yi rtas //
T15D4345:161a-14: 'phral du rgyal bar nus pa yin //
T15D4345:161a-15: de phyir khyed kyis de la ni //
T15D4345:161a-16: shin tu gus shing brtse bar bya //
T15D4345:161a-17: rgyal po sman pa'i chos don dang //
T15D4345:161a-18: phun tshogs pa yang gzhan las min //
T15D4345:161a-19: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las ngas pa'i tshig gi le'u ste gsum pa'o /
T15D4345:161a-21: // / sha li ho tra blo gros che //
T15D4345:161a-22: rta yi gnas na 'dug pa la //
T15D4345:161a-23: legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas //
T15D4345:161a-24: slar yang pa la dris gyur pa //
T15D4345:161a-25: rta ni ci ltar byung bar gyur //
T15D4345:161a-27: de ni dang por rgyal po dag / gang gi bzhon pa nyid du 'gyur //
T15D4345:161a-28: de yi rigs bzhi ci lta bu //
T15D4345:161a-29: de lta bur ni ci ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:161a-31: de dag shes par 'tshal lags so //
T15D4345:161a-32: de yi tshig ni thos pa dang //
T15D4345:161a-33: sha li ho tras smras gyur pa //
T15D4345:161a-34: 'di na rgyal po'i chos kyi mchog / sa rnams yongs su skyong ba yin //
T15D4345:161a-35: de yang dpung gis byed par nus //
T15D4345:161a-36: dpung gi mchog ni rta rnams yin //
T15D4345:161a-37: de phyir rang don la mkhas pa'i //
T15D4345:161a-38: rgyal po'i chos don 'dod don du //
T15D4345:161a-39: yang ye rnam pa thams cad du //
T15D4345:161a-40: 'bad de rta rnams bsrung bar bya //
T15D4345:161a-41: chos dang grags 'dod sman pa ni //
T15D4345:161a-42: bstan bcos mkhas gyur pas kyang bsten //
T15D4345:161a-43: de bas de rnams lha dang ni //
T15D4345:161a-44: mi ni ji ltar byung ba bshad //
T15D4345:161a-45: rigs dang nye ba'i rigs dang tshe //
T15D4345:161a-46: na tshod shis dang mi shis dang //
T15D4345:161a-47: gtsug dang gdong dang thig le dang //
T15D4345:161a-49: mtshan ngan gnyen po mchan khung dang //
T15D4345:161b-0: 'byung dang bzhon @161b ba'i bya ba dang //
T15D4345:161b-1: nad med nad ni rgyas pa dang //
T15D4345:161b-2: rna ba rnams kyi sman dang ni //
T15D4345:161b-3: de bzhin sman ni byung ba yin //
T15D4345:161b-4: go rims ci bzhin nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:161b-5: spu mdog mdog 'dres khyad par dang //
T15D4345:161b-6: spu mdog dag dang mig dag dang //
T15D4345:161b-7: rang bzhin snying stobs dag dang ni //
T15D4345:161b-8: ston ka skyes pa'i mtshan nyid de //
T15D4345:161b-9: 'di dag thams cad mdor bsdus nas //
T15D4345:161b-10: khyed la legs par bshad par bya //
T15D4345:161b-11: lha rnams kyis ni mngal skyes dang //
T15D4345:161b-12: mngal med byung ba gnyis su bshad //
T15D4345:161b-13: sngon tshe 'jig rten zhig gyur cing //
T15D4345:161b-15: 'byin byed me la sbyin sreg ni //
T15D4345:161b-16: byas pas dang por tshangs pa dang //
T15D4345:161b-17: rta pho de rjes rgod ma mchog / rang gi skye gnas dag tu bskyed //
T15D4345:161b-18: gzhan yang skye dgu'i bdag mo yi //
T15D4345:161b-19: mchod sbyin la ni tshangs pa yi //
T15D4345:161b-20: mchi ma byung ba dpal mo ni //
T15D4345:161b-21: dga' bas snyim pa sbyar bas blangs //
T15D4345:161b-22: de yi yan lag las byung ste //
T15D4345:161b-23: rta rnams bram ze'i rigs sogs gyur //
T15D4345:161b-24: kha dang dpung pa brla gnyis dang //
T15D4345:161b-25: rkang pa gnyis las go rims bzhin //
T15D4345:161b-26: g-yas g-yon las ni pho mo ste //
T15D4345:161b-27: changs pa las rta de ltar skyes //
T15D4345:161b-28: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i tshe //
T15D4345:161b-29: rta dang bdud rtsi lhan cig byung //
T15D4345:161b-30: de ming au tsa sra ba ste //
T15D4345:161b-31: sgra ni sprin chen lta bu yin //
T15D4345:161b-32: rgya mtsho de las nam mkha' la //
T15D4345:161b-33: shugs kyis rnam par 'gro ba na //
T15D4345:161b-34: lha min stobs dang lha 'khrug pas //
T15D4345:161b-35: phyi rkang gnyis ni bzung bar gyur //
T15D4345:161b-36: stobs chen stobs ldan gyis drangs pas //
T15D4345:161b-37: dpyi ni cung zad nyams par gyur //
T15D4345:161b-38: de bas rta rnams da rung mi //
T15D4345:161b-39: dbyi ni myur bar mi 'debs shing //
T15D4345:161b-40: ngal so ba na rkang pa ni //
T15D4345:161b-41: phyi ma res kyis dal bar 'degs //
T15D4345:161b-42: tshangs pa'i bur gyur gtum po ni //
T15D4345:161b-43: dmod pa yis ni 'ug par gyur //
T15D4345:161b-44: yid 'ong yid kyi mchod sbyin ni //
T15D4345:161b-45: ri dags mor gyur de gnyis 'dus //
T15D4345:161b-46: de la sgo nga sna tshogs pa //
T15D4345:161b-47: du ma byung bar gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:161b-48: lte ba man chad mes gdungs pa'i //
T15D4345:161b-49: rdul ni thal bar 'dzag gyur pa //
T15D4345:161b-50: de las kyang ni kha dog rnams //
T15D4345:161b-51: tha dad bong pho bong mor gyur //
T15D4345:161b-52: sgra skad rtsub cing rno ba dang //
T15D4345:161b-53: rang bzhin rtsub cing rkang pa rtsub //
T15D4345:162a-2: skye dgu'i bdag gi gnas na 'dug //
T15D4345:162a-3: de nas de dag rmongs pa yis //
T15D4345:162a-4: de yi sbyin sreg khang pa brlag / des ni de la bsad dang bcings //
T15D4345:162a-5: sgro bcad rtsva ni za ba dang //
T15D4345:162a-6: lha dang mi yi bzhin pa ni //
T15D4345:162a-7: nyid gyur cig ces dmod pa btab //
T15D4345:162a-8: rta de yid ni khums gyur nas //
T15D4345:162a-9: skye dgu'i bdag la gsol ba btab //
T15D4345:162a-10: de nas de la mgu gyur nas //
T15D4345:162a-11: mchog 'di thob par gyur pa yin //
T15D4345:162a-12: rta yi mchod sbyin la bsad dang //
T15D4345:162a-13: g-yul du g-yo bar gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:162a-14: legs par sbyin pa btang ba na //
T15D4345:162a-15: bsod nams khyed kyis thob gyur cig / de bzhin du ni yon gnas kyi //
T15D4345:162a-16: mchog nyid du ni rta gyur cig //
T15D4345:162a-17: dad pas dge sbyong bram ze la //
T15D4345:162a-18: rta rnams byin par gyur na ni //
T15D4345:162a-19: rta yi ba spu ji snyed par //
T15D4345:162a-20: lha yul du ni skye bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:162a-21: sbyin ba btang ba'i rta yang ni //
T15D4345:162a-23: de nas skye dgu'i bdag po yis //
T15D4345:162a-24: tshig gis 'dus nas kha ba can //
T15D4345:162a-25: sha li ho tra la 'khur zhing //
T15D4345:162a-26: drang srong rnams dang lhan cig rtse //
T15D4345:162a-27: stobs ldan au tsa sra ba ni //
T15D4345:162a-28: zhon nas lha rnams gzir bar byed //
T15D4345:162a-29: lha kun mngon mtho 'dod pa yis //
T15D4345:162a-30: sha li ho tra la gsol btab //
T15D4345:162a-31: de nas lha la bzhon pa'i phyir //
T15D4345:162a-32: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin //
T15D4345:162a-33: zla ba la dkar lha chen la //
T15D4345:162a-34: ljang gu khyab 'jug la rta ser //
T15D4345:162a-36: me lha la dmar gshin rje nag //
T15D4345:162a-38: sngo dang khra bo tha skar gyi //
T15D4345:162a-39: bu gnyis dmar po rlung lha la //
T15D4345:162a-40: lha rnams gzhan la sna tshogs pa //
T15D4345:162a-41: rang rang ji ltar dga' bar ni //
T15D4345:162a-43: lhag ma'i rta ni skye dgu'i bdag / yid ches byas pas blangs nas ni //
T15D4345:162a-44: de yis mi yi rgyal po la //
T15D4345:162a-45: ci rigs par ni bgos te byin //
T15D4345:162a-46: gshog pa bcad pas de rnams ni //
T15D4345:162a-47: na gyur slar yang me yis bsregs //
T15D4345:162a-48: nad gdungs sha li ho tra la //
T15D4345:162a-49: 'khus par gyur te khro ba yi //
T15D4345:162a-50: mche ba bcad nas stobs kyis ni //
T15D4345:162a-51: de gnyid log pa bza' snam na //
T15D4345:162a-52: de tshe drang srong mi snang gyur //
T15D4345:162a-53: de nas rta rnams zos snyam nas //
T15D4345:162a-54: dga' bar rta spangs 'byin cing snom //
T15D4345:162b-0: @162b de phyir rta rnams da rung yang //
T15D4345:162b-1: rta spangs btang nas snom par byed //
T15D4345:162b-2: skye dgu'i bdag gi khyim bdag tshe //
T15D4345:162b-3: ha ha zer bas ha yar bshad //
T15D4345:162b-4: bya ltar gshog pa mgyogs 'gro bas //
T15D4345:162b-5: mgyogs 'gro zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:162b-6: lam rdzogs mgyogs pas byed pa ni //
T15D4345:162b-8: lha rnams kyis ni rta byung ba //
T15D4345:162b-9: rnam pa bzhi ste du ma'ang yin //
T15D4345:162b-10: bong bu rgod ma la dre'u //
T15D4345:162b-11: bong bu bas ni bzang bar 'dod //
T15D4345:162b-12: dre'u las skyes ki na yin //
T15D4345:162b-13: de las skyes ba ki sa ta ta //
T15D4345:162b-14: ki sa ta ta'i bu chu bur can //
T15D4345:162b-15: chu bur can bu bong bur gyur //
T15D4345:162b-16: rang dang rta yi skye gnas te //
T15D4345:162b-17: bong bu'i skye gnas gnyis su 'dod //
T15D4345:162b-18: bong bu dang ni rta sogs la //
T15D4345:162b-19: lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog / de ltar rigs kyi dbye ba 'di //
T15D4345:162b-20: go rims bzhin du brjod pa yin //
T15D4345:162b-21: rta rnams kyi ni 'byung ba dag //
T15D4345:162b-22: slar yang 'od chen bka' stsol cig /
T15D4345:162b-23: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las byung nyid //
T15D4345:162b-24: thams cad shes par 'tshal lags so //
T15D4345:162b-25: bu yis de ltar dris pa dang //
T15D4345:162b-26: sha li ho tras smras pa ni //
T15D4345:162b-27: skye dgu dang po byung ba'i tshe //
T15D4345:162b-29: de rjes lha dang lha min gyi //
T15D4345:162b-30: 'jig rten kun la tshangs pa yis //
T15D4345:162b-31: 'jig rten thams cad khyab byed pa'i //
T15D4345:162b-32: skom gyis gdungs pa nyid du byas //
T15D4345:162b-33: 'jig rten pa yi srog chags rnams //
T15D4345:162b-34: slar yang rgyug cing 'gro bar byed //
T15D4345:162b-35: lha dang lha min sha za dang /
T15D4345:162b-36: lto 'phye srin po de rnams kyang //
T15D4345:162b-37: stobs dang ldan pa'i skom gyis ni //
T15D4345:162b-38: gdungs pas nye bar zin par gyur //
T15D4345:162b-39: lha dang lha min kha zas dang //
T15D4345:162b-40: mal stan la ni dga' med gyur //
T15D4345:162b-41: de rnams de ltar sems pa na //
T15D4345:162b-42: de yi tshe na blo skyes pa //
T15D4345:162b-43: gang 'di chu yi snying por ni //
T15D4345:162b-44: gnas der bdag cag skom sel gyur //
T15D4345:162b-45: de nas ri bo mand'a ra //
T15D4345:162b-46: grags ldan srub zhing nyid du byas //
T15D4345:162b-47: klu yi rgyal chen mtha' yas ni //
T15D4345:162b-48: srub thag tu ni yang dag sbyar //
T15D4345:162b-49: der ni phyogs gcig lha rnams te //
T15D4345:162b-50: phyogs gcig tu ni lha min gnas //
T15D4345:162b-51: srub thag 'dren zhing mtsho chen ni //
T15D4345:162b-52: 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams bsrubs pa na //
T15D4345:162b-53: mtsho chen der ni lha dang mi'i //
T15D4345:162b-54: sman ni rtsa ba lo ma dang //
T15D4345:162b-55: 'o mar bcas pa bsdus nas ni //
T15D4345:163a-0: @163a * // thams cad bcug pa nyid du 'gyur //
T15D4345:163a-1: gzi brjid che zhing gzi brjid can //
T15D4345:163a-2: ro la sogs pa 'byung zhing dge / me tog
T15D4345:163a-3: ser dang go sring gi / de bzhin sor mo
T15D4345:163a-4: la spyod dang // mdangs ldan dz'a ti sa ra dang //
T15D4345:163a-6: de bzhin rma 'tsho byed la sogs //
T15D4345:163a-7: gzhan yang tshangs pas gang sprul ba'i //
T15D4345:163a-8: bcud dang mthu stobs bsam mi khyab //
T15D4345:163a-9: sman rnams mtsho chen der bcug sta //
T15D4345:163a-10: rgya mtsho bsrubs par gyur pa na //
T15D4345:163a-11: de tshe dang po kho nar ni//
T15D4345:163a-12: dpal mo la sogs byung bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:163a-13: gang gis nang bar brjod na ni //
T15D4345:163a-14: rmi ngan la sogs 'jig byed pa'i //
T15D4345:163a-15: dge ba zhes bya'i rin po che //
T15D4345:163a-16: brgyad ni chu las byung bar gyur //
T15D4345:163a-17: nyi ma bzhon pa'i shing rta ni //
T15D4345:163a-18: 'dren pa'i rta dang lha yi chang //
T15D4345:163a-19: de bzhin nor bzang ko thu ba //
T15D4345:163a-20: nor bu'i rna cha bzang po dang //
T15D4345:163a-21: bdud rtsi zhes bya'i sman dang ni //
T15D4345:163a-22: bdud rtsi nyid kyang byung bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:163a-23: bstan bcos thams cad 'dzin pa'i mchog / sman pa thang la 'bar dang ni //
T15D4345:163a-24: sgra mtho zhes ni bya ba'i rta //
T15D4345:163a-25: snying stobs che zhing stobs che la //
T15D4345:163a-26: 'brug dang rnga yi sgra dang ni //
T15D4345:163a-27: dung dang rnga chen sgra 'dra ba //
T15D4345:163a-28: gang zhig skad gsang mthon po yis //
T15D4345:163a-29: sgra des ming du btags pa ni //
T15D4345:163a-30: de tshe lha dang lha min gyis //
T15D4345:163a-31: sgra mtho zhes ni bya bar btags //
T15D4345:163a-32: sprin dkar gyi ni mdog 'dra zhing //
T15D4345:163a-33: mgyogs shing bdud rtsi las byung ba //
T15D4345:163a-34: mdangs ldan rgya mtsho chen po las //
T15D4345:163a-35: byung ste mkha' la 'gro bar byed //
T15D4345:163a-36: stobs ldan zhes bya'i snang byed bus //
T15D4345:163a-37: de yi rkang pa gnyis las bzung //
T15D4345:163a-38: de tshe lha min thams cad kyis //
T15D4345:163a-39: mand'a ra dang de bzhin du //
T15D4345:163a-40: klu yi rgyal po bor nas ni //
T15D4345:163a-41: rta yi rin chen la 'jus te //
T15D4345:163a-42: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho spangs nas ni //
T15D4345:163a-43: sa gzhi 'dir ni phyin par gyur //
T15D4345:163a-44: lha min bum pa mnyam pa dang //
T15D4345:163a-45: de bzhin sems rab 'phags pa dang //
T15D4345:163a-47: gnod skyobs gser mdog ces bya ba //
T15D4345:163a-48: chu bur zlum ngo zhes bya bas //
T15D4345:163a-49: stobs ldan la ni tshig 'di smras //
T15D4345:163a-50: gang gis dpal thob 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:163a-51: don gnyer rin che thob pas na //
T15D4345:163a-52: bdag cag lha dang mi rnams la //
T15D4345:163b-0: @163b rtag par rab tu dga' byed cing //
T15D4345:163b-1: thams cad stobs kyis dregs pa dang //
T15D4345:163b-2: lha min skyes bu thams cad ni //
T15D4345:163b-3: dga' zhing mgu ba nyid du bya //
T15D4345:163b-4: de nas stobs ldan yid dga' bas //
T15D4345:163b-5: des ni lha rnams la smras pa //
T15D4345:163b-6: rgya mtsho chen po bsrubs pa las //
T15D4345:163b-7: rin chen gang zhig thob gyur pa //
T15D4345:163b-8: de ni nga la byin pas na //
T15D4345:163b-9: gzhan gyis de rnyed 'or ma yin //
T15D4345:163b-10: lha rnams kyis kyang tshig smras pa //
T15D4345:163b-11: bdag cag gi yang rtsal yin pas //
T15D4345:163b-12: rin chen khyod ni gcig pu'i min //
T15D4345:163b-13: khyed dang bdag cag thun mong yin //
T15D4345:163b-14: de nas lo ni khri yi bar //
T15D4345:163b-15: skar ma'i tshud kyis g-yul 'gyed de //
T15D4345:163b-16: lha dang lha min g-yul ngor ni //
T15D4345:163b-17: dpung tshogs ldang zhing ldang zhing 'thab //
T15D4345:163b-18: de tshe stobs ldan sgra mtho ba'i //
T15D4345:163b-19: stobs mgyogs ldan pa'i rta zhon nas //
T15D4345:163b-20: lha rnams kyi ni dpung gi tshogs //
T15D4345:163b-21: chen po dag kyang brlag par gyur //
T15D4345:163b-22: gang yang der ni lha rnams kyis //
T15D4345:163b-23: g-yul du bsad pa'i lha min rnams //
T15D4345:163b-24: rta dbang de yis bsnams pa dang //
T15D4345:163b-25: yang dang yang du slar 'tsho gyur //
T15D4345:163b-26: de nas lha min chen po yis //
T15D4345:163b-27: bsad par gyur pas rmongs nas ni //
T15D4345:163b-28: skyabs 'dod pa yis tshangs pa la //
T15D4345:163b-29: skyabs su nye bar song bar gyur //
T15D4345:163b-30: legs ldan stobs chen ldan pa yi //
T15D4345:163b-31: lha min g-yul gyis pham par bgyis ;
T15D4345:163b-32: / legs ldan gyis ni bdag cag la //
T15D4345:163b-33: bzhon pa bzang po stsal ba'i rigs //
T15D4345:163b-34: bdag cag gis kyang lha min gyi //
T15D4345:163b-35: g-yul bo'i gnas las rgyal bar bgyi //
T15D4345:163b-36: de nas tshangs pa skye dgu yi //
T15D4345:163b-37: bdag pos de la smras pa ni //
T15D4345:163b-38: phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang rung //
T15D4345:163b-39: nga nyid kyis ni sngar shes te ;
T15D4345:163b-40: / gang tshe gnag gis ci tsam 'gyur //
T15D4345:163b-41: 'di ni kho bos sngar shes pas //
T15D4345:163b-42: nga yis sngon tshe rta sprul bas //
T15D4345:163b-43: de bzhin sa steng 'gro ba dang //
T15D4345:163b-44: bar snang dang ni sa 'og gi //
T15D4345:163b-45: rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin dang //
T15D4345:163b-46: srog chags rnams ni gang ci'ang rung //
T15D4345:163b-47: de dag thams cad mngon sprul to //
T15D4345:163b-48: mchod sbyin bzhon pa'i don du ni //
T15D4345:163b-49: rta yang nga yis sngon phyung ste //
T15D4345:163b-50: sbyin sreg byed tshe nga yi ni //
T15D4345:163b-51: mchi ma 'dzag par gyur pa de //
T15D4345:163b-52: dpal mo yid ni dga' ba yis //
T15D4345:163b-53: lag pa gnyis kyis blangs par gyur //
T15D4345:163b-54: de las der ni rta byung bas //
T15D4345:163b-55: de phyir dpal mo'i bu zhes bya //
T15D4345:164a-2: mchi ma las ni rta phor gyur //
T15D4345:164a-3: g-yon pa'i mchi ma las rgod ma //
T15D4345:164a-4: snying stobs ldan dang mgyogs mdangs ldan //
T15D4345:164a-5: dpal mo'i lag pa'i nga'i mchi ma //
T15D4345:164a-6: der ni rta de bram ze'i rigs //
T15D4345:164a-7: nga yi mchi ma dpal mo yi //
T15D4345:164a-8: lag pa gnyis las 'dzag gyur pa //
T15D4345:164a-9: brang na gnas pa rgyal rigs te //
T15D4345:164a-10: g-yul ngor sra bar shes par bya //
T15D4345:164a-11: lte ba brla yi rje'u rigs te //
T15D4345:164a-12: rkang pa 'dzag pa dmangs rigs yin //
T15D4345:164a-13: der ni g-yon ngos rgod ma ste //
T15D4345:164a-14: g-yas ngos kyis ni rta phor bshad //
T15D4345:164a-16: rigs bzhi dag tu bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:164a-17: de ltar rta rnams yang dag byung //
T15D4345:164a-18: yid ltar mgyogs zhing dog ldan te //
T15D4345:164a-19: mdog gcig mdog ni 'dres pa dang //
T15D4345:164a-20: sna tshogs mdangs kyis phye ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-21: thog le can dang kha dog mda' //
T15D4345:164a-22: mtshan ma can dang zhur ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-23: rkang dkar rngog ma mun dza 'dra //
T15D4345:164a-25: rnga rngog mdog ni mang ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-26: khra bo thig le phra ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-27: 'dams mdog se ba nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:164a-28: dkar la rngog ma gnag pa ste //
T15D4345:164a-29: phal cher kha dog sna tshogs shing //
T15D4345:164a-30: ba spu snum zhing bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-31: tshad dang ldan zhing mig bzang la //
T15D4345:164a-32: ro stod mtho bar gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:164a-33: dbus phra gsus khyim chung ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-34: mchu legs brang zhed yangs pa dang //
T15D4345:164a-35: rngog ma rked pa rmig pa bzang //
T15D4345:164a-36: pags srab spu mtshams phra ba dang //
T15D4345:164a-37: yid du 'ong zhing phum phum bzang //
T15D4345:164a-38: snying stobs ldan zhing rkang mdog mthun //
T15D4345:164a-39: lus las skyes pa'i gshog pa bzhi //
T15D4345:164a-40: nam mkha' 'gebs pa lta bu dang //
T15D4345:164a-41: yan lag dang ni nyid lag rnams //
T15D4345:164a-42: lha yi char ldan gzi brjid che //
T15D4345:164a-43: dpal ldan gyur pa dpal mo'i bu //
T15D4345:164a-44: tshangs pa'i mchi ma las byung mgyogs //
T15D4345:164a-45: me yis gdungs pa las gyur ba'i //
T15D4345:164a-46: lte ba las ni byung ba'i rdul //
T15D4345:164a-49: / bong bu dang ni bong mor gyur //
T15D4345:164a-50: rna ba ring zhing mjug mar ldan //
T15D4345:164a-51: gzhung thig phra zhing rmig pa sra //
T15D4345:164a-52: skad gdangs rtsub cing khur sran che //
T15D4345:164a-53: gang zhig rtsub ba bong bu yin //
T15D4345:164a-54: thal ba las ni skyes pa'i phyir //
T15D4345:164a-55: de bas bong bu thal mdog ldan //
T15D4345:164a-56: de dag de ltar gyur nas ni //
T15D4345:164b-0: skye @164b dgu'i bdag mo'i gnas na 'dug //
T15D4345:164b-1: de nas dregs pas rtse ba dang //
T15D4345:164b-2: sreg rdzas dgang gzar blugs gzar dang //
T15D4345:164b-3: gzhong pa snod dang bum pa bsnams //
T15D4345:164b-4: rmongs pa'i rta yis rab tu brlag /'jag mag thal bas khyab pa yi //
T15D4345:164b-5: mi gang de ni mthong ba dang //
T15D4345:164b-6: dang khra khros par gyur nas na //
T15D4345:164b-7: rta rnams dmod pa btab par gyur //
T15D4345:164b-8: gshog bcad mtshan ni nub pa dang //
T15D4345:164b-9: sa la rgyu zhing tshig mi 'don //
T15D4345:164b-10: lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyi //
T15D4345:164b-11: bzhon pa nyid du song gyur cig / de thos sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te //
T15D4345:164b-12: de tshe rta rnams dang khra ni //
T15D4345:164b-13: de nyid la ni skyabs song nas //
T15D4345:164b-14: slar yang rjes su phan btags byas //
T15D4345:164b-15: rta yi mchod sbyin 'bras bu ni //
T15D4345:164b-16: bsod nams don du 'gro gyur cing //
T15D4345:164b-17: mchod pa bzang po thob gyur cing //
T15D4345:164b-18: bsod nams 'jig rten gyis thob shog //
T15D4345:164b-19: phan btags thob pas de dga' ste //
T15D4345:164b-20: dang khra la ni bskor bar byas //
T15D4345:164b-21: mgo bos phyag byas bdag cag gis //
T15D4345:164b-22: ci zhig bgyis zhes tshig tu smras //
T15D4345:164b-23: dang khras der ni lung bsgo ba //
T15D4345:164b-24: kha ba can du khyed song la //
T15D4345:164b-26: chu dang ldan par gnas par gyis //
T15D4345:164b-27: de skad smras nas rta rnams ni //
T15D4345:164b-28: dga' ba ri rgyal dag tu song//
T15D4345:164b-29: sbyin sreg bshigs pas khros pa na //
T15D4345:164b-30: dang khras ha ha zhes bzlog pas //
T15D4345:164b-31: de phyir 'di la ha yi sgra //
T15D4345:164b-32: rta rnams la ni btags pa yin //
T15D4345:164b-33: ri bo dam pa de ru ni //
T15D4345:164b-34: rta rnams gnas par gyur pas ni //
T15D4345:164b-35: gang zhig 'dod pa spyod gyur pa //
T15D4345:164b-36: rigs ni 'dres par gyur ba'i rgyus //
T15D4345:164b-37: rta dang bong bu de dag gi //
T15D4345:164b-38: skye gnas 'dre bar bshad par bya //
T15D4345:164b-39: bong bu rta la 'jug gyur pa //
T15D4345:164b-41: dre'u dang rgod ma dag las ni //
T15D4345:164b-42: go ri zhes ni bya ba skye //
T15D4345:164b-43: go ri rgod mar 'jig pa las //
T15D4345:164b-44: ki ni zhes ni bya ba skye //
T15D4345:164b-45: ki ni rgod ma las skyes pa //
T15D4345:164b-46: ki sa ta ta zhes bya ba yin //
T15D4345:164b-47: ki sa ta ta dang rgod ma las //
T15D4345:164b-48: chu bur can zhes bya ba yin //
T15D4345:164b-49: chu bur can dang rgod ma las //
T15D4345:164b-50: slar yang bong bu zhes byar bshad //
T15D4345:164b-51: bong bu 'ong bar mthong na ni //
T15D4345:164b-52: rta ni thams cad rmongs par 'gyur //
T15D4345:164b-53: bya ba mang zhing bslab bar dka' //
T15D4345:165a-4: rang dang rta yi skye gnas te //
T15D4345:165a-5: bong bu'i skye gnas gnyis su 'dod //
T15D4345:165a-6: rta rnams gzhan gyi mngal du ni //
T15D4345:165a-7: 'khrig pa spyod par mi byed la //
T15D4345:165a-8: gal te byed par gyur na ni //
T15D4345:165a-9: yul de 'jig par shes par bya //
T15D4345:165a-10: de ltar nga ni rta 'byin la //
T15D4345:165a-11: mchod sbyin don ni phyugs kyi mchog //
T15D4345:165a-12: dgra 'joms rgyas byed la sogs pa //
T15D4345:165a-13: rgyal po rnams kyi dpung gi mchog //
T15D4345:165a-14: de nas kha don la dga' zhing //
T15D4345:165a-15: sbyin sreg byed la rab gzhol ba //
T15D4345:165a-16: gzhon nu tshangs par spyod la gnas //
T15D4345:165a-17: sha li ho tra dka' thub che //
T15D4345:165a-18: kha ba can gyi ngos kyi nags //
T15D4345:165a-20: de ni de ru gnas bcas nas //
T15D4345:165a-21: ri yi tshogs ni nyams dga' zhing //
T15D4345:165a-22: ri dags tshogs ni du mas khyab //
T15D4345:165a-23: mi 'am ci ni sna tshogs gnas //
T15D4345:165a-24: bya tshogs du ma sgra sgrogs shing //
T15D4345:165a-25: dri za'i bu mo rnams kyis bskor//
T15D4345:165a-26: grub dang drang srong rol pa yi //
T15D4345:165a-27: tshogs dang lha rnams dag gis mdzes //
T15D4345:165a-28: me tog 'bras bu mang po yis //
T15D4345:165a-29: nyams dga' ne'u gseng bzang pos khyab //
T15D4345:165a-30: shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gnas //
T15D4345:165a-31: nyams dga' der ni gnas par gyur //
T15D4345:165a-32: der ni phye leb yan chad kyi //
T15D4345:165a-33: ri dgas la sogs na tshogs gnas //
T15D4345:165a-34: rta dang dri za mi 'am ci //
T15D4345:165a-35: ne'u le sbrul dang bya rnams ni //
T15D4345:165a-36: seng ge stag dang phag dang ni //
T15D4345:165a-37: glang po'i dbang po spre'u dang dom //
T15D4345:165a-38: de la sogs pa mang po ni //
T15D4345:165a-39: sha li ho tra drang srong che //
T15D4345:165a-40: bdag nyid thul cing gtsang ba yis //
T15D4345:165a-41: gnas dang nye bar 'khod pa na //
T15D4345:165a-42: sha li ho tras rta de rnams //
T15D4345:165a-43: bu dang 'dra bar yongs su bskyad //
T15D4345:165a-44: kha ba can gyi ngos na rtse //
T15D4345:165a-45: sha li ho tra'i dbang du gyur //
T15D4345:165a-46: de bas lha rnams myur du ni //
T15D4345:165a-47: sha li ho ta'i gnas su song //
T15D4345:165a-48: der ni khyed la bzhin pa mgyogs //
T15D4345:165a-49: sha li ho tra ster bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:165a-50: lha mchog tshangs pas de skad du //
T15D4345:165a-51: lha rnams la ni smras pa dang //
T15D4345:165a-52: dga' bas de ltar bgyi zhes te //
T15D4345:165a-53: de rnams ri mchog de ru chas //
T15D4345:165a-54: de nas skad cig tsam gyis ni //
T15D4345:165a-55: brgya byin gshin rje chu lha dang //
T15D4345:165a-56: dpal ldan nor gyi bdag po dang //
T15D4345:165a-57: bcas pa drang srong gnas su song //
T15D4345:165b-0: phyin nas @165b bsti gnas gnas de la //
T15D4345:165b-1: snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras //
T15D4345:165b-2: drang srong khyed ni gang gi phyir //
T15D4345:165b-3: dka' thub gnas bcas dka' thub grub //
T15D4345:165b-4: tshur spyon grub dang drang srong tshogs //
T15D4345:165b-5: mi bzang pa yi gnas su dengs //
T15D4345:165b-6: de nas ngas ni dgra 'joms pa'i //
T15D4345:165b-7: brgya byin la ni der smras pa //
T15D4345:165b-8: nga la dka' thub yang spyad pa //
T15D4345:165b-9: mi dgos de ltar bya zhes smras //
T15D4345:165b-10: de nas nga la gshin rje yis //
T15D4345:165b-11: snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras //
T15D4345:165b-12: rga med 'chi med zad med pa //
T15D4345:165b-13: lha yi dbang po'i gnas 'dra ba //
T15D4345:165b-14: 'jig rten kun na gnag bzang ba'i //
T15D4345:165b-15: gnas de nga yis spyin par bya //
T15D4345:165b-16: zas dang stan dang mal khri dang //
T15D4345:165b-17: spyod lam ci bde gnas med pa'i //
T15D4345:165b-18: nags tshal 'dir ni dka' thub can //
T15D4345:165b-19: khyed ni ji ltar dka' bar gyur //
T15D4345:165b-20: brgya byin bcas pa'i lha mchog ni //
T15D4345:165b-21: kun la nga yis lhar smras pa //
T15D4345:165b-22: rtsa ba 'bras bu nga yi za //
T15D4345:165b-23: gos ni shing shin ri dgas pags //
T15D4345:165b-24: 'don dang spyin sreg byed pa'i na //
T15D4345:165b-25: mthar thug med par nga'i blo 'jug / ri dags tshegs kyang rtag tu ni //
T15D4345:165b-26: kho bo'i bsti gnas dag tu 'ongs //
T15D4345:165b-27: glo bur lhags pa gzhan dag dang //
T15D4345:165b-28: gshog thogs dag ni blta bya yin //
T15D4345:165b-29: de dang lhan cig gnas bya yin //
T15D4345:165b-30: lha yul 'dod pa nga la med //
T15D4345:165b-31: de nas dgra thub gshin rje yis //
T15D4345:165b-32: nga la yang ni slar smras pa //
T15D4345:165b-33: gang dang 'grogs na khyed dga' ba'i //
T15D4345:165b-34: gzugs sdug ri dags bya tshogs dang //
T15D4345:165b-35: gshog pa yod pa'i rkang bzhi pa //
T15D4345:165b-36: thams cad bdag cag la bstan gsol //
T15D4345:165b-37: nga yis de ltar khas blangs te //
T15D4345:165b-38: ri dags bya tshogs de dag kun //
T15D4345:165b-39: ji srid mthong bar gyur gyi bar //
T15D4345:165b-40: lha rnams yud tsam 'dug par gyis //
T15D4345:165b-41: de nas lha rnams mkha' las ni //
T15D4345:165b-42: phyogs rnams kun nas 'ongs gyur cing //
T15D4345:165b-43: ri rtse chu bo rnams las kyang //
T15D4345:165b-44: brang gi phyogs ni ston cing 'ongs //
T15D4345:165b-45: de tshe rta phran par snang la //
T15D4345:165b-47: rnar snyan pa yi sgra dang ni //
T15D4345:165b-48: gshog pa'i rlung ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T15D4345:165b-49: sgra des mdangs dang ldan pa yi //
T15D4345:165b-50: sgra des ngo mtshar skyes par gyur //
T15D4345:165b-51: lha rnams dga' bas nga la ni //
T15D4345:165b-52: snum zhing yid 'od zab pa dang /
T15D4345:165b-53: rjes mthun sgra ldan pa snyam dga' //
T15D4345:165b-54: ae ma'i mtho ris mtshungs zhes smras //
T15D4345:166a-2: gnas par gyur pa legs so legs //
T15D4345:166a-3: kye ma'o ri dags gzugs bzang zhing //
T15D4345:166a-4: nyams stobs snying por mgyogs par ldan //
T15D4345:166a-5: lha dang mi ni su la yang //
T15D4345:166a-7: bdag cag 'di la zhon nas ni //
T15D4345:166a-9: khyod kyis bdag cag la gsol cig / ci ltar bzhon par gyur pa yi //
T15D4345:166a-10: thabs de drang srong mchog gis ni //
T15D4345:166a-11: yid la bdag cag bsam par 'dod //
T15D4345:166a-12: de nas de skad smras pa yi //
T15D4345:166a-13: lha mchog rnams la ngas lan smras //
T15D4345:166a-14: lha min brlag pa'i don dang ni //
T15D4345:166a-15: de phyir khyed rnams rgyal phyir dang //
T15D4345:166a-16: bram ze rnams kyi mchod sbyin phyir //
T15D4345:166a-17: tshangs pas rta ni sprul pa yin //
T15D4345:166a-18: de bas tshangs pas nga bsgo bas //
T15D4345:166a-19: khyed rnams shas cher dga' 'gyur pa'i //
T15D4345:166a-20: bzhon pa rnams kyi dam pa ni //
T15D4345:166a-21: ma lus par ni sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:166a-22: lha yi dam pa khyed rnams ni //
T15D4345:166a-23: bram ze'i yul du 'gro bar gyis //
T15D4345:166a-24: der ni 'dul thabs bya ba dag /'ongs nas bya yi gzhan du min //
T15D4345:166a-25: der song de rjes nga yis ni //
T15D4345:166a-26: rta ni ji snyed bod par bya //
T15D4345:166a-27: de nas nga yis rta rnams kun //
T15D4345:166a-28: bsdus nas tshig ni 'di skad smras //
T15D4345:166a-29: bla ma mkhan po mdza' ba dang //
T15D4345:166a-30: gnyen dang rang mi rnams kyang ni //
T15D4345:166a-31: ring bar blta bar nga 'dod la //
T15D4345:166a-32: khyed rnams la yang mgron du 'bod //
T15D4345:166a-34: ma sha nas dang til dag dang //
T15D4345:166a-35: s'a lu drug cu pa dang 'bru //
T15D4345:166a-36: rtsva ni mtho zhing 'jam pa dang //
T15D4345:166a-37: chu bo ne'u gsing rnams kyang yod //
T15D4345:166a-38: de'i nags gzar po ma yin na //
T15D4345:166a-40: yang na 'di ru gnas par gyis //
T15D4345:166a-41: de nas nga la rta kun gyis //
T15D4345:166a-42: snyan pa'i tshig tu 'di skad smra //
T15D4345:166a-43: nags tshal stong pa 'di mthong na //
T15D4345:166a-44: bdag cag shas cher yid skyo bas //
T15D4345:166a-46: bdag cag der 'breng gzhan du min //
T15D4345:166a-47: khyed kyi rjes su 'brangs te ni //
T15D4345:166a-48: 'gro ba bdag cag rab tu bsngags //
T15D4345:166a-49: de nas nga ni rtas bskor zhing //
T15D4345:166a-50: bde gnas dgra dang lhan cig tu //
T15D4345:166a-51: gang du lha dang dus btab pa'i //
T15D4345:166a-52: bram ze'i yul du phyin par gyur //
T15D4345:166a-53: des ni aa shvadtha yi rtsvar //
T15D4345:166b-0: gtsub shing @166b las ni me phyung ste //
T15D4345:166b-1: sbyin sreg nga yis byas nas ni //
T15D4345:166b-2: lha dang srin po tshim par byas //
T15D4345:166b-3: de nas yul de'i sa mtshams kyi //
T15D4345:166b-4: nye 'khor kun du khyab nas ni //
T15D4345:166b-5: rta de dag gis 'bru dag ni //
T15D4345:166b-6: thams cad za ba nyid du 'gyur //
T15D4345:166b-7: de nas 'bru de brlag gyur pa //
T15D4345:166b-8: bram zes mthong nas khros pa yi //
T15D4345:166b-9: yid kyis mig ni dmar po dang //
T15D4345:166b-10: de la tshig rtsub 'di skad smra //
T15D4345:166b-11: sngon ni dka' thub la gnas pa'i //
T15D4345:166b-13: dka' thub tshangs par spyod pa dang //
T15D4345:166b-14: 'don dang sbyin sreg byed pa yis //
T15D4345:166b-15: lo grangs mang por 'dir gnas shing//
T15D4345:166b-16: de bzhin yams kyang zhi byed na //
T15D4345:166b-18: khyer te yul du ji ltar 'ong //
T15D4345:166b-19: lam gang nas ni khyed 'ongs pa //
T15D4345:166b-20: de las slar ni 'gro bar gyis //
T15D4345:166b-21: khyed kyi yams 'di bdag cag gis //
T15D4345:166b-22: bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
T15D4345:166b-23: bram ze khros ba de la ngas //
T15D4345:166b-25: rta rnams 'bru ni za ba dang //
T15D4345:166b-26: khyed la 'tshe bar nga mi dga' //
T15D4345:166b-27: sbyin sreg byed pas nga brel bas //
T15D4345:166b-28: khyed la gnod pa ngas ma bkag / de nas nga yis rta rnams ni //
T15D4345:166b-29: thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad smras //
T15D4345:166b-30: nga la yul gyi mi rnams ni //
T15D4345:166b-31: ci skad smras gyur pa la ltos //
T15D4345:166b-32: 'di dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir //
T15D4345:166b-33: re zhig khyed ni legs par bcing //
T15D4345:166b-34: de nas mtshan mor gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:166b-35: slar yang ci dgar spyad par gyis //
T15D4345:166b-36: de nas bcings pa'i tshor ba ni //
T15D4345:166b-37: ma myong bas na bcing bar lhags //
T15D4345:166b-38: lha rnams ltad mo skyes pa yi //
T15D4345:166b-39: yid kyis nga la yid ches 'gyur //
T15D4345:166b-40: de nas chu lha rang nyid ni //
T15D4345:166b-41: bos nas zhags pas rta rnams ni //
T15D4345:166b-42: yan lag lngar bcas shing la ni //
T15D4345:166b-43: go rims bzhin du bcings par gyur //
T15D4345:166b-44: bcings pa'i rjes la stobs yod kyang //
T15D4345:166b-45: 'gul bar gyur ba ma gyur to //
T15D4345:166b-46: nye bar bcing ba byas nas ni //
T15D4345:166b-47: mtshon ni rnon po thogs nas su //
T15D4345:166b-48: lha yis mdun dang rgyab kyi ni //
T15D4345:166b-49: rta rnams kyi ni gshog pa bregs //
T15D4345:166b-50: de nas gshog pa bcad kyang ni //
T15D4345:166b-51: phyi phyir zhing ni skye bar gyur //
T15D4345:166b-52: de rjes me yis bsregs pas na //
T15D4345:166b-53: tshig pas me lce byung bar gyur //
T15D4345:166b-54: bcings shing gshog pa med byas nas //
T15D4345:167a-2: de tshe lha rnams yid la ni //
T15D4345:167a-3: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du khyer //
T15D4345:167a-4: zla bas ri bong dkar 'dra ba //
T15D4345:167a-5: nyi ma ne tsho'i mdog 'dra ba //
T15D4345:167a-6: brgya byin gyis ni sngo bsangs te //
T15D4345:167a-7: gshin rje yis ni nag po yin //
T15D4345:167a-8: me lhas rgya skyegs mdog 'dra ba //
T15D4345:167a-9: rlung lhas dmar ser mdog 'dra ba //
T15D4345:167a-10: chu lhas sngon po khyer bar gyur //
T15D4345:167a-11: nyi ma gzhan gyis kha dog skya //
T15D4345:167a-12: lha chen gyis ni ser po ste //
T15D4345:167a-13: sna tshogs las kyis rgyang mdog can //
T15D4345:167a-14: nyi ma su shas sna gnag pa //
T15D4345:167a-15: trashtas mtshan dang ldan pa ste //
T15D4345:167a-16: lha gzhan gyis ni rang rang gi / yid la 'dod pa bzhin du khyer //
T15D4345:167a-17: de ltar rta rnams bgos nas ni //
T15D4345:167a-18: lhag ma nga yi gnas bzhag ste //
T15D4345:167a-19: g-yul du dgos pa'i las rnams dang //
T15D4345:167a-20: mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams dang ni //
T15D4345:167a-21: gso dang slar 'bros las rnams la //
T15D4345:167a-22: bu dang lhan cig nye bar bskyang //
T15D4345:167a-23: nga'i bu mdza' bo las rgyal dang//
T15D4345:167a-24: 'khrul med tha chungs byed pa zhes //
T15D4345:167a-25: yon tan nges las ming btags pa //
T15D4345:167a-26: bu gsum mkhas par gyur pa yin //
T15D4345:167a-27: zhi zhing mdza' bo rnams las rgyal //
T15D4345:167a-28: des de mdza' las rgyal zhes bya //
T15D4345:167a-29: rigs byed bstan bcos ma 'khrul bas //
T15D4345:167a-31: nga yi tshig la mngon dga' bas //
T15D4345:167a-32: rtag tu 'di ltar byed pas na //
T15D4345:167a-33: de'i phyir de la byed pa zhes //
T15D4345:167a-34: tha chungs la ni btags pa yin //
T15D4345:167a-35: de nas rta gzhan bdag nyid che //
T15D4345:167a-36: ma na zhes bya tshangs sras byin //
T15D4345:167a-37: de las gzhan pa rta bres su //
T15D4345:167a-38: las rnams la ni byang bar byas //
T15D4345:167a-39: bzhon pa la ni gdul pa dang //
T15D4345:167a-40: bya ba'i las rnams la yang gzhag / nga ni rgas phyir grol ba tshol //
T15D4345:167a-41: rta rnams kyi ni nang du nyal //
T15D4345:167a-42: de nas rta khros pa yis nga //
T15D4345:167a-43: gnyid log snyam ste bsad par brtsams //
T15D4345:167a-45: skyo ba'i yid dang phan tshun smra //
T15D4345:167a-46: bdag cag bcing dang gsod 'di ni //
T15D4345:167a-47: gang las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur ba //
T15D4345:167a-48: 'di dag kun gyi rtsa ba ni //
T15D4345:167a-49: drang srong gnyid log 'di yin gyi //
T15D4345:167a-50: de bas gnod byas lan bya zhing //
T15D4345:167a-51: zos par gyur na legs pa yin //
T15D4345:167a-52: de nas bcings pa bcad nas ni //
T15D4345:167b-0: nga gsod phyir ni lhags @167b par gyur //
T15D4345:167b-1: nga ni de la thabs gang gis //
T15D4345:167b-2: bde bar 'gyur zhes sems shing nyal //
T15D4345:167b-3: de nas lha yis sad byas pa //
T15D4345:167b-4: nga yis rta la dmod pa btab //
T15D4345:167b-5: deng nas brtsams te nga yi ni //
T15D4345:167b-6: dmod pas bzhon khyed dong la ni //
T15D4345:167b-8: brjed ngas pa ni nyid gyur cig /
T15D4345:167b-9: de nas de ni 'chig pa dag / skyes shing dmod pas brjed ngas gyur //
T15D4345:167b-10: de skad de la ngas smras nas //
T15D4345:167b-11: gnas de nas ni mi snang byas //
T15D4345:167b-12: rta yi sgra de thos pa dang //
T15D4345:167b-13: de nas rta yis 'tsho ba dang //
T15D4345:167b-14: rta la zhon dang 'ching byed dang //
T15D4345:167b-15: rta bres su ni 'ongs par gyur //
T15D4345:167b-16: rta rnams grol nas gnas gnas su //
T15D4345:167b-17: phan tshun rgyu bar byed pa dang //
T15D4345:167b-18: mal khri rgya chen dag dang ni //
T15D4345:167b-19: mal stan dag kyang stong pa mthong //
T15D4345:167b-20: de yis nga ni ma mthong bas //
T15D4345:167b-21: rta rnams kyis ni zos snyam na //
T15D4345:167b-22: de yi mal khri las mtshon pas //
T15D4345:167b-23: bram ze mi snang nyid gyur snyam //
T15D4345:167b-24: 'di ltar rta ni de dag rnams //
T15D4345:167b-25: bram ze zos par byas snyam sems //
T15D4345:167b-26: de yi phyir na rta rnams ni //
T15D4345:167b-27: rta spangs btang nas mang du snom //
T15D4345:167b-28: sha li ho tra ci nas kyang //
T15D4345:167b-29: phyis mi 'byung bar gyur to snyam //
T15D4345:167b-30: rta yi skye ba byung ba 'di //
T15D4345:167b-31: gang zhig rtag tu nyan byed pa'am //
T15D4345:167b-32: yang na la la 'dzin byed dam //
T15D4345:167b-33: gtam la dad par gyur na ni //
T15D4345:167b-34: lha rnams kyis ni bkur ba dang //
T15D4345:167b-36: tshe ring ba ni thob 'gyur zhing //
T15D4345:167b-37: grags pa che ba nyid du 'gyur //
T15D4345:167b-38: 'di ltar lha yi mthu ldan zhing //
T15D4345:167b-40: drang srong sha li ho tra yis //
T15D4345:167b-41: bu yis dris te smras pa yin //
T15D4345:167b-42: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rta rnams byung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
T15D4345:167b-44: // / tha skar tsha bo drang srong che //
T15D4345:167b-45: rta skad las ni lus skyes pa //
T15D4345:167b-46: lha yi mthu ldan dka' thub can //
T15D4345:167b-47: tshangs pa nyi ma me'i gzi mdangs //
T15D4345:167b-48: sha li ho tra drang srong mchog / de la legs thos kyis dris pa //
T15D4345:167b-50: srog ni ji ltar 'dzin pa lags //
T15D4345:167b-51: lus gzungs rmig pa spu dag dang //
T15D4345:167b-52: nad gzhi lto ba 'byung ba dang //
T15D4345:167b-53: yan lag lus kyi sha rnams dang //
T15D4345:167b-54: rtsa dang rus pa de bzhin tshigs //
T15D4345:168a-2: / mngal du ji ltar 'tsho ba lags //
T15D4345:168a-4: mtshan mi ldan dang ma ning dang //
T15D4345:168a-5: rte'u pho gnyis sam rte'u mo gnyis //
T15D4345:168a-6: skye ba'am g-yang gsham nyid 'gyur ba'am //
T15D4345:168a-8: phra dang rags pa ji ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:168a-9: 'dug pa dang ni nyal ba dang //
T15D4345:168a-10: mngal du zhu dang skams pa dang //
T15D4345:168a-11: shin tu dgye dang mthug pa dang //
T15D4345:168a-12: bslab sbyang so sor shes pa dang //
T15D4345:168a-13: de bzhin zas dang rno dang bul //
T15D4345:168a-14: lho dang zhi ba ji ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:168a-15: dpal dang mi 'jigs blo ldan dang /
T15D4345:168a-16: stobs che mgyogs bdun tshogs dang //
T15D4345:168a-17: bul dang blo ni zhen pa dang //
T15D4345:168a-18: sbegs dang nyams dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:168a-19: ngang tshul mdangs ldan nad med dang //
T15D4345:168a-20: phor skyes don med ci lta bu //
T15D4345:168a-21: tshe ring ba dang tshe thung nyid //
T15D4345:168a-22: bkra shis bkra mi shis gzugs bzang //
T15D4345:168a-24: sna tshogs dbye ba ji ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:168a-25: mtshan dang rlig pa lce dang ni //
T15D4345:168a-26: spu dang rngog ma dag dang rkan //
T15D4345:168a-27: so dang rmig pa mig mi sdug / kha dog mi sdug ji ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:168a-28: sgur dang ma ning yan lag nyams //
T15D4345:168a-29: gzugs dang mjug ma yo ba dang //
T15D4345:168a-31: rna yon kha ni che ba dang ;
T15D4345:168a-32: / mi sdug pa yi nad bu can //
T15D4345:168a-34: si si can nam khyi rngo can //
T15D4345:168a-35: mngal du gnas tshe ji ltar 'gyur //
T15D4345:168a-36: de ltar blo ldan gyis dris tshe //
T15D4345:168a-37: sha li ho tras smras gyur pa //

T15D4345:171a-47: rta yi pags par phyin na ni //
T15D4345:171a-48: rta ni dmar gro dag tu 'gyur //
T15D4345:171a-49: gang tshe mkhris pa mang gyur cing //
T15D4345:171a-50: khrag dang bad kan nyung gyur pa //
T15D4345:171a-51: rte'u'i pags par phyin gyur na //
T15D4345:171a-52: rta ni gro nag dag tu 'gyur //
T15D4345:171a-53: brtag pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis //
T15D4345:171a-54: bad kan dang ni khrag 'dres dang //
T15D4345:171b-0: khrag mkhris @171b 'dres par gyur pa las //
T15D4345:171b-1: rta ni ser skya dag tu 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-2: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang //
T15D4345:171b-3: khrag rnams 'dres par gyur pa las //
T15D4345:171b-4: rta rnams kyi ni kha dog dag / rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:171b-5: nad gzhi rlung gis bcad gyur pa //
T15D4345:171b-6: pags par phan tshun gtor ba las ;
T15D4345:171b-7: / khra bo dang ni thig le can //
T15D4345:171b-8: kha dog dbye ba dag tu 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-10: de bzhin snying stobs dag tu 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-11: mdangs dang rlung ni shas che zhing //
T15D4345:171b-12: ma 'dres zas ni za ba las //
T15D4345:171b-13: nad med par ni 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:171b-14: me rlung snying stobs dag las dpal //
T15D4345:171b-15: 'byung ba chen po cha mnyam zhing //
T15D4345:171b-17: snying stobs rlung dang stobs che las //
T15D4345:171b-18: mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-19: sems dang blo dang snying stobs yid //
T15D4345:171b-20: de bzhin bad kan rang bzhin can ;
T15D4345:171b-21: /'di dag lhags par gyur pa las //
T15D4345:171b-22: yan lag bcu chang blo ldan 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-23: dge zhing byad la rab dga' dang //
T15D4345:171b-24: de bzhin dbang po dga' byed pa //
T15D4345:171b-25: rigs dang dus tshigs phun tshogs ldan //
T15D4345:171b-26: yid dang blo ni ma yengs pa //
T15D4345:171b-27: mngal du rta ni gang skyes pa //
T15D4345:171b-28: de ni yon tan kun ldan 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-29: de las bzlog par gang skyes pa //
T15D4345:171b-30: de ni yon tan can mi 'gyur //
T15D4345:171b-31: bzang dang rno dang zhan pa ste //
T15D4345:171b-32: rang bzhin rnam gsum ci bzhin dang //
T15D4345:171b-33: skye ba'i cha yang de bzhin te //
T15D4345:171b-34: rang bzhin gsum du shes par bya //
T15D4345:171b-35: mngal du gnas nas zla gnyis na //
T15D4345:171b-36: nags su nye bar bskyad bya zhing //
T15D4345:171b-37: kha zas sna tshogs pa dag dang //
T15D4345:171b-38: thug pa dang ni bldag pa sbyin //
T15D4345:171b-39: der ni rtag tu gang brten pa //
T15D4345:171b-40: kha zas gang zhig 'dod gyur pa //
T15D4345:171b-41: de ni yid la re bar bshad //
T15D4345:171b-42: 'di ni de la sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:171b-43: gal te 'dod pa ma byin na //
T15D4345:171b-44: gzugs mi sdug cing mi srun dang //
T15D4345:171b-45: yan lag mi tshang blo chung dang //
T15D4345:171b-46: 'jigs skyen stobs chung sems nyams shing //
T15D4345:171b-47: 'dus dang las kyi dbang dang ni //
T15D4345:171b-48: nad gzhi rnams kyi rang bzhin las //
T15D4345:171b-49: mngal du skye bar 'gyur ba ni //
T15D4345:171b-50: ci lta bar ni yongs su bshad //
T15D4345:172a-1: thos thos dang ldan pa yis //
T15D4345:172a-2: tshul bzhin yongs su dris pa na //
T15D4345:172a-3: sha li ho tra dka' thub ches //
T15D4345:172a-4: dris lan de ltar smras pa yin //
T15D4345:172a-5: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las mngal du chags pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o /
T15D4345:172a-7: // / rta skad las skyes drang srong ni //
T15D4345:172a-8: rta yi rang bzhin shes gyur pa //
T15D4345:172a-9: sha li ho tra nyid las ni //
T15D4345:172a-10: legs thos kyis ni yongs su dris //
T15D4345:172a-11: bu yis dris nas drang srong de //
T15D4345:172a-12: dga' ba'i tshig tu smras pa ni //
T15D4345:172a-13: rlung dang mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can //
T15D4345:172a-14: rang bzhin gsum du shes par bya ;
T15D4345:172a-15: / rtsub cing mi brtan rnga rngog srab //
T15D4345:172a-16: 'jigs skyen sgyid zhan khur stobs chung //
T15D4345:172a-17: lam gyis dub cing sna nang mang //
T15D4345:172a-18: gnyid med shin tu gzugs mi sdug /'khrig pa la 'du 'dul bar dka' //
T15D4345:172a-19: 'dod pa'i nus pa chung ba dang //
T15D4345:172a-20: rlung gis gang tshe 'khums pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-21: slar yang rjes su rgyug pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-22: rtag tu rta rdzi rnams dang ni //
T15D4345:172a-23: rta la sogs ni 'debs pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-24: mi dang rta yi phyi nas ni //
T15D4345:172a-25: rdun nas mdun du ba rgyug pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-26: 'dre bar byed tshe lus kun ni //
T15D4345:172a-27: bzlog cing 'dre bar ma nus kyi //
T15D4345:172a-28: gzhogs gcig pa ni yang dang yang //
T15D4345:172a-29: 'gre bar byed pa 'ang nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:172a-30: de bzhin lam gyi gzhi mnyam par //
T15D4345:172a-31: khal med par yang bub pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-32: brdeg kyang rang gi spyod pa ni //
T15D4345:172a-33: yun ring zhig nas 'dor ba dang //
T15D4345:172a-34: bslabs pa rnams ni brjed gyur pa'i //
T15D4345:172a-35: rta ni rlung gi rang bzhin can ;
T15D4345:172a-36: / rdul can khro ba yun ring dang //
T15D4345:172a-37: gnyid med 'thab la dga' ba dang //
T15D4345:172a-38: so dang de bzhin lag gnyis kyis //
T15D4345:172a-39: rta la rtag tu 'tshe ba dang //
T15D4345:172a-40: rta rji'i las ni byed pa la //
T15D4345:172a-41: rang bzhin zhi ba ston pa ni //
T15D4345:172a-42: rtag tu 'jigs shing nus pa chung //
T15D4345:172a-43: lam dang las la sran chung dang ;
T15D4345:172a-44: / gzhogs gcig gis ni cung zad tsam //
T15D4345:172a-45: thog mar 'dre bar byed gyur cing //
T15D4345:172a-46: de rjes lus ni thams cad kyis //
T15D4345:172a-47: zlog cing 'dre bar byed pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-48: de bzhin nyam nga'i lam du ni //
T15D4345:172a-49: khal gyis du ba na bub pa dang //
T15D4345:172a-50: 'dul sbyong ba yi tshig snyan cing //
T15D4345:172b-1: grang ba la ni dga' gyur pa'i //
T15D4345:172b-2: rta ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can //
T15D4345:172b-3: spu mdog snum zhing stobs che la //
T15D4345:172b-4: sgra snyan dal gyis 'tsher ba dang //
T15D4345:172b-5: rta dang de bzhin mi rnams la //
T15D4345:172b-6: rang bzhin zhi ba ston pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-7: 'dul spyod sla zhing bslabs la brtan //
T15D4345:172b-8: gnyid che rtag tu brtag pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-9: khal dang lam du g-yul ngo ru //
T15D4345:172b-10: rtag tu sdug bsngal cher bzod dang //
T15D4345:172b-11: chu la brtan zhing shugs che la //
T15D4345:172b-12: gang du'ang bub par 'gyur ma yin //
T15D4345:172b-13: 'gro tshe gzhogs ni gnyis ka yis //
T15D4345:172b-14: yang dang yang du zlog pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-16: shugs kyis mchod bar 'dod pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-17: bdag po la ni dga' ba yi //
T15D4345:172b-18: rta ni bad kan rang bzhin can //
T15D4345:172b-19: mtshan nyid gnyis ka dang ldan pa //
T15D4345:172b-20: rang bzhin gnyis pa zhes byar bshad //
T15D4345:172b-21: rlung dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can //
T15D4345:172b-22: tha ma yin par yongs su bshad ;
T15D4345:172b-23: / rlung dang bad kan rang bzhin can //
T15D4345:172b-24: bar ma dag ni yin par bshad //
T15D4345:172b-25: mkhris pa bad kan rang bzhin can //
T15D4345:172b-26: rta ni rab mchog yin par bshad //
T15D4345:172b-27: nad med lus zungs mnyam gyur cing //
T15D4345:172b-28: bad kan can gyi rta bsngags so //
T15D4345:172b-29: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rta'i rang bzhin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o /
T15D4345:172b-31: // / legs thos thos pa 'dzin pa yi //
T15D4345:172b-32: bu la sha li ho tras smras //
T15D4345:172b-33: bzang po sman dang ri dags dang //
T15D4345:172b-34: 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis //
T15D4345:172b-35: stobs chen mdog ni snum pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-36: dul ba'i gzugs can gtsang sbrar ldan //
T15D4345:172b-37: tshangs spyod mtshan mo gnyid log cing //
T15D4345:172b-38: le lo med cing phrag dog med //
T15D4345:172b-39: langs nas gnyid ni log pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-40: rtag tu langs nas 'dug pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-41: bdag po la dga' ldab skyen dang //
T15D4345:172b-42: bslabs pa nam yang mi 'dor dang //
T15D4345:172b-43: thams cad du ni dpa' ba dang ;
T15D4345:172b-44: / g-yul dang lam dang me la ni //
T15D4345:172b-45: sdug bsngal gyis zhum med pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-46: nad kyis gdungs par gyur na yang //
T15D4345:172b-47: shin tu nyon mongs med pa dang //
T15D4345:172b-48: ci yang rung ba zos nas ni //
T15D4345:172b-49: myur du lus ni rgyas 'gyur dang //
T15D4345:172b-50: thams cad du ni brtan pa yi //
T15D4345:173a-2: bkra shis mtshan nyid ldan mod kyi //
T15D4345:173a-3: cung zad smad pa yod pa dang //
T15D4345:173a-4: bslab pa myur du lobs na yang //
T15D4345:173a-5: myur du brjed par gyur na yang //
T15D4345:173a-6: mtshan mo'i dus su lus phab ste //
T15D4345:173a-7: gnyid ni log par byed pa dang //
T15D4345:173a-8: rta la zhe sdang che ba dang //
T15D4345:173a-10: dang po dpa' zhing de rjes la //
T15D4345:173a-12: lcag gis cung zad gzhus pa na'ang //
T15D4345:173a-13: ring du 'gro bar byed pa ste //
T15D4345:173a-14: de lta bu yi rigs ldan pa'i //
T15D4345:173a-15: rta ni dman pa nyid yin no //
T15D4345:173a-16: rtsub cing rta la 'jigs skyen dang //
T15D4345:173a-17: gnyid che rgyun can le lo can //
T15D4345:173a-18: lto che sbegs cing 'khyam la dga' //
T15D4345:173a-19: de bzhin kun du dog pa can //
T15D4345:173a-20: nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo 'ang rung //
T15D4345:173a-21: yan lag ma lus brkyang nas ni //
T15D4345:173a-22: rtag tu gnyid ni log pa dang //
T15D4345:173a-23: rta la 'tsho bar byed la dga' //
T15D4345:173a-24: lcag gis gzhus la mi tshor zhing //
T15D4345:173a-25: myur du na bar byed pa dang //
T15D4345:173a-26: lus rgyas par ni dga' ba yi //
T15D4345:173a-27: rta ni ri dgas skye gnas yin //
T15D4345:173a-29: de bzhin dbye ba mang po'ang yod //
T15D4345:173a-30: bzang po mchog tu shes par bya //
T15D4345:173a-31: dman pa bar ma zhes bshad la //
T15D4345:173a-32: ri dags tha ma yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:173a-33: rta yi skye gnas 'di nyid yin //
T15D4345:173a-34: mdor na skyon dang yon tan dag /'dres dang lhag pa yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:173a-35: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rta'i skye gnas kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o /
T15D4345:173a-37: // / rta yi rang bzhin de nyid shes //
T15D4345:173a-38: dul la brtson zhing dbang po thul //
T15D4345:173a-39: sha li ho tra blo chen la ;
T15D4345:173a-40: / mdza' bo las rgyal gyis dris pa //
T15D4345:173a-41: gzi brjid chen po rta rnams kyi //
T15D4345:173a-42: rigs bzhi ji ltar shes par bgyi //
T15D4345:173a-43: mtshan nyid spyod lam gang dag gis //
T15D4345:173a-44: de las bzlog par shes par bgyis //
T15D4345:173a-45: de skad dris te drang srong che //
T15D4345:173a-46: sha li ho tras slar smras pa //
T15D4345:173a-47: rta yi rigs bzhi shes dga' bas //
T15D4345:173a-48: de ni nga yis go bar bya //
T15D4345:173a-49: rigs bzhi rnam par dbye ba ni //
T15D4345:173a-50: skye gnas dang ni gzugs byad dang //
T15D4345:173a-51: tshul spyod dang ni dul ba dang //
T15D4345:173a-52: skad gdangs dbyibs dang kha dog dang //
T15D4345:173a-53: dri nyid las ni nyer shes bya //
T15D4345:173a-54: gang zhig de las go bzlog ste //
T15D4345:173b-0: @173b de yi khyad par smra ba ni //
T15D4345:173b-1: nyon la rnam par dpyad par gyis //
T15D4345:173b-2: gzugs bzang dpal dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-3: spyod pa dul zhing bsngags par 'os //
T15D4345:173b-4: blo ldan ngang tshul bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-5: 'dul sbyong mkhan gyis byas pa nyan //
T15D4345:173b-6: rjes su mthun zhing nus pa ldan //
T15D4345:173b-7: gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dag la brten //
T15D4345:173b-8: bkres dang skom la sran che zhing //
T15D4345:173b-9: khro ba chung zhing blan par sla //
T15D4345:173b-10: gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan //
T15D4345:173b-11: las rnams kun gyi rjes su 'jug / btung dang kha zas bza' bya yi //
T15D4345:173b-12: lhag ma dang ni mi gtsang dang //
T15D4345:173b-13: rta spangs dang ni de bzhin gcin ;
T15D4345:173b-14: /'di ni ring du spong byed cing //
T15D4345:173b-15: gtsang zhing gtsang mar spyod pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-16: nyal yang gnyid ni med pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-17: sbrang rtsi 'bras yos khur ba mar //
T15D4345:173b-18: 'o thug sreg rdzas la dga' zhing //
T15D4345:173b-19: dri dang sna ma'i phreng ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-20: khrus dang bkra shis la dga' zhing //
T15D4345:173b-21: 'tsher zhing de dag snom pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-22: mi dag lta na sdug pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-23: 'jigs med mkhas la sran che dang //
T15D4345:173b-24: snyan par 'tsher zhing sgra skad che //
T15D4345:173b-25: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-26: phal cher sbrang rtsi ltar ser dang //
T15D4345:173b-27: 'gros che sran ni che ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-28: brtan zhing snyan pa rjes su 'tsher //
T15D4345:173b-29: mdog snum pags pa srab pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-30: bram ze kun la dga' ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-31: gnyid log tshe ni 'bras yos dang //
T15D4345:173b-32: mar dang au shir dri 'byung la //
T15D4345:173b-33: lha dang dri za'i snying stobs can //
T15D4345:173b-34: dge zhing rtag tu des pa ste //
T15D4345:173b-35: de lta'i tshul spyod ldan pa'i rta //
T15D4345:173b-36: bram ze'i rigs su shes par bya //
T15D4345:173b-37: rgyal rigs khro ba'i tshul can te //
T15D4345:173b-38: tshangs pa'i mdog ldan shes par bya //
T15D4345:173b-39: rang bzhin rno zhing dpa' ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-40: sgra skad btang nas 'tsher ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-41: dpung pa glo zhing snying stobs che //
T15D4345:173b-42: rang bzhin gtsang zhing spyod pa yang //
T15D4345:173b-43: gces par bsdus dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-44: yan lag 'byes shing pags pa srab //
T15D4345:173b-45: spyod pa gtsang zhing dul ba dang //
T15D4345:173b-46: 'jigs pa rnams la mi skrag pa //
T15D4345:173b-47: chu dang me dang 'brug sgra dang //
T15D4345:173b-48: sgra cher grags dang lhung dang khur //
T15D4345:173b-49: tsha dang rtsub pa'i reg pa dang //
T15D4345:173b-50: sa rtsub shing gi tshang tshing dang //
T15D4345:173b-51: ring du 'gro dang lam dog par //
T15D4345:174a-2: glang po'i tshogs ni chen po dang //
T15D4345:174a-3: dril bu rol mo'i sgra rnams dang //
T15D4345:174a-4: ca co 'don pa'i sgra rnams dang //
T15D4345:174a-5: rta gzhan 'tshor bar gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:174a-6: dung dang rnga chen sgra dang ni //
T15D4345:174a-7: rol mo'i sgra dang rdza rnga'i sgra //
T15D4345:174a-8: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis //
T15D4345:174a-9: skrag par mi 'gyur rta mchog yin //
T15D4345:174a-10: rnga rngog legs par brkyang nas ni //
T15D4345:174a-11: dga' ba'i yid kyis 'tsher ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-12: rkang gnyis legs par 'jug bzhin du //
T15D4345:174a-13: sa steng na ni 'tsher ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-14: rdul dang gcin dang rta sbangs ni //
T15D4345:174a-15: yan lag brkyang ste 'dor ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-16: mthar ni shugs kyis 'dor ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-17: rta gzhan la ni bsdigs pa dang //
T15D4345:174a-18: g-yul ngor rta dang glang po dang //
T15D4345:174a-19: shing rta dpung bu chung 'joms dang //
T15D4345:174a-21: phyogs kun khyab par 'tsher ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-22: rta gzhan dag ni phyin nas ni //
T15D4345:174a-23: de ni 'gro bar bzod mi byed //
T15D4345:174a-24: mtshon gyis bsnun kyang nad chung zhing //
T15D4345:174a-26: spyod pa myur zhing dpa' ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-27: 'thab tshe myur du pha rol gnon //
T15D4345:174a-28: nor bu lta bur mig ser zhing //
T15D4345:174a-29: mdog bzang kha dog ngan pa med //
T15D4345:174a-30: blo ldan de bzhin mgyogs ba dang //
T15D4345:174a-31: sgrin zhing ma zhum stobs che la //
T15D4345:174a-32: rtag tu las kun nus pa dang //
T15D4345:174a-33: bag yod rtag tu nyon mongs med //
T15D4345:174a-34: bsod nams byed pa'i me tog mar //
T15D4345:174a-35: 'bras bu ldan pa'i dri yod la //
T15D4345:174a-36: lha dang dri za'i snying stobs can //
T15D4345:174a-37: de mtshungs spyod yul spyod par ldan //
T15D4345:174a-38: dge zhing spyod pa nges pa'i rta //
T15D4345:174a-39: rgyal rigs su ni shes par bya //
T15D4345:174a-40: rje'u rigs btung ba la dga' brtan //
T15D4345:174a-41: zhi zhing blo che le lo can //
T15D4345:174a-43: dul ba'i spyod pa yang dag ldan //
T15D4345:174a-44: khro ba med cing nga rgyal med //
T15D4345:174a-45: dul zhing dang tshul snyoms pa dang //
T15D4345:174a-46: nad dang tsha dang bkres pa bzod //
T15D4345:174a-47: khal bkal lam du 'gro tshe brtan //
T15D4345:174a-48: de ni mgyogs bul ran ma yin //
T15D4345:174a-49: nyams dang lus stobs bar ma ste //
T15D4345:174a-50: mig ni de bzhin sngo dang ser //
