T15D4345:177b-3: mjug do shin tu rgyas min zhing //
T15D4345:177b-4: ha cang zhum pa yang ma yin //
T15D4345:177b-5: rgyab gzhung bas ni mtho na bzang //
T15D4345:177b-6: sra zhing zlum la rgyus mi mngon //
T15D4345:177b-7: gsal zhing rim gyis mdzes par gnas//
T15D4345:177b-8: shin tu thung dang ring ba min //
T15D4345:177b-9: gdong gi tshad dang mnyam pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-10: mjug ma dang legs 'brel ba bzang //
T15D4345:177b-11: rta yi rnga ma spu ring zhing //
T15D4345:177b-12: ma nyams kha dog gcig pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-13: mnyen zhing snum par gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:177b-14: rta la shis par bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:177b-15: mjug tsos shin tu mtho ma yin //
T15D4345:177b-16: shin tu gyes dang 'dus pa'ang min //
T15D4345:177b-17: lus dang rjes mthun tshad dang ldan //
T15D4345:177b-18: de lta bu dag bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:177b-19: rkub ni zab cing zlum pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-20: dbyibs legs phyi rol gnyer ma med //
T15D4345:177b-21: gang gis rta spangs legs gtod ba //
T15D4345:177b-22: de ni rab tu bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:177b-23: brla nang shin tu yangs min zhing //
T15D4345:177b-24: dog par gyur pa min na bsngags //
T15D4345:177b-25: rlig pa ngo mnyam legs 'brel skyes //
T15D4345:177b-26: spu ni med par gyur pa dang /
T15D4345:177b-27: dbus ni bil ba tsam zhig ni //
T15D4345:177b-28: shin tu mi 'phyang gyur ba bsngags //
T15D4345:177b-29: mtshan ni rtsa sbom rim gyis phra //
T15D4345:177b-30: 'jam zhing myur du ldang ba dang //
T15D4345:177b-31: sbubs yangs pa sa ni g-yogs pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-32: kha zhing shin tu phye zhing zlum //
T15D4345:177b-33: gting ring kha dog gcig ldan pa'i //
T15D4345:177b-34: rta ni bsngags par 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:177b-35: dpyi mgul mnyam zhing dbyibs legs la //
T15D4345:177b-36: bags srab spu ni legs pa bzang //
T15D4345:177b-37: rkub tshos sra zhing legs par 'brel //
T15D4345:177b-38: rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon bzang //
T15D4345:177b-39: dbyi ni legs par 'byor ba dang //
T15D4345:177b-40: legs par rdzogs par gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-41: yangs shing dkyus ni ring ba dang //
T15D4345:177b-42: pags pa srab la sha rgyas bzang ;
T15D4345:177b-43: / rje ngar snyoms shing dbyibs legs dang //
T15D4345:177b-44: rim gyis phra bar gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:177b-45: shin tu phra ba'i rus pas khyab //
T15D4345:177b-46: rta ni bsngags par 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:177b-47: che drang la sogs lus stod ni //
T15D4345:177b-48: ci 'drar ro smad de bzhin du //
T15D4345:178a-2: de yi 'og tu rgod ma yi //
T15D4345:178a-3: lus kyi phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dag / gang dag yin pa bshad par bya //
T15D4345:178a-4: de yi mtshan ni mnyam che gsal //
T15D4345:178a-5: legs par bltams shing legs par 'dzag / bug che zhing grva mtshams che //
T15D4345:178a-6: ring zhing mtshan ni rgya phyed la //
T15D4345:178a-7: mngal gyi nyes pa dang bral ba //
T15D4345:178a-8: de yi mo mtshan de 'dra bsngags //
T15D4345:178a-9: nu ma zlum zhing rgyas pa dang //
T15D4345:178a-10: shin tu 'phyang ba ma yin dang //
T15D4345:178a-11: 'o ma skyon med legs par rgyas //
T15D4345:178a-12: rgod ma rab tu bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:178a-13: nu sor mnyam zhing zlum pa dang //
T15D4345:178a-14: bu ga legs shing 'o ma rgyas //
T15D4345:178a-15: shin tu 'dus min gyes pa'ang min //
T15D4345:178a-16: mthug cing brtan la legs par skyes //
T15D4345:178a-19: lhag ma rgod ma'i yan lag kun //
T15D4345:178a-20: rta pho dang ni 'dra bar bsngags //
T15D4345:178a-21: de lta mod kyi gzugs mdzes pas //
T15D4345:178a-22: rgod ma'i gzugs ni bzang bar bshad //
T15D4345:178a-23: lus ni sbom por gyur pa yang //
T15D4345:178a-24: phra ba lta bur mngon pa yin //
T15D4345:178a-25: lus srab par ni gyur na yang //
T15D4345:178a-26: rgod ma spu mdangs yod pa mngon //
T15D4345:178a-27: de 'dra'i tshul gyis lus kyi ni //
T15D4345:178a-28: dbyibs kyi bye brag shes par bya ;
T15D4345:178a-29: / rgod ma rta pho 'dra ba dang //
T15D4345:178a-30: rta pho rgod ma 'dra bar ru //
T15D4345:178a-31: gal te phyin ci log ci snang //
T15D4345:178a-33: lus che mdangs ni bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:178a-34: legs par skyes zhing tshad dang ldan //
T15D4345:178a-35: gzi brjid yan lag dbyes pa dang //
T15D4345:178a-36: yan lag cha ni snyoms pa dang //
T15D4345:178a-37: gtsug 'khyil dge zhing gzi mdangs dge / dri bzang yan lag mi sdug med //
T15D4345:178a-38: lus rgyas 'gros ni bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:178a-39: 'jigs med gnas gsum yangs pa dang //
T15D4345:178a-40: tshad mnyam dbyi bas ni legs pa ste //
T15D4345:178a-41: gang zhig de 'dra'i lus ldan pa ;
T15D4345:178a-42: / bdag po'i grags dang rigs dang nor //
T15D4345:178a-44: yon tan phyin ci log ldan pa //
T15D4345:178a-45: bdag po'i don rnams nyams byed yin //
T15D4345:178a-46: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las yan lag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T15D4345:178b-0: // / @178b dka' thub bsam gtan chen po yis //
T15D4345:178b-1: gzi byin gsal gyur drang srong la //
T15D4345:178b-2: blo dang ldan pa legs thos kyis //
T15D4345:178b-3: sngar bshad pa ni dris gyur pa //
T15D4345:178b-4: khyod kyis phyogs bstan gsungs mod kyi //
T15D4345:178b-5: bshad pa dag ni ma gsungs pas //
T15D4345:178b-6: bstan pa rnams kyi bshad pa ni //
T15D4345:178b-7: legs ldan gsung bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T15D4345:178b-8: bstan pa bshad pa dang bcas pa //
T15D4345:178b-9: bu yis bskul bas smras pa ni //
T15D4345:178b-10: mid pa srol gong dang 'brel bas //
T15D4345:178b-11: ro 'dzin lcer ni shes par bya //
T15D4345:178b-12: de yi steng ni rkan yin te //
T15D4345:178b-13: ma rkan lce 'og yin par bshad //
T15D4345:178b-15: ldang pa'i so ni yin par bshad //
T15D4345:178b-16: de las gzhan pa mdun gyi so //
T15D4345:178b-17: bcu gnyis mtshan mar ldan pa yin //
T15D4345:178b-18: de rnams kyi ni dbus gnas pa //
T15D4345:178b-19: steng 'og bzhi ni mche ba yin //
T15D4345:178b-21: gnyis po mchu ni yin par bshad //
T15D4345:178b-22: mchu mtha' yi ni ngos gnyis na //
T15D4345:178b-24: ya mchu'i stang na sgros yod de //
T15D4345:178b-25: de yi steng gi mchu lhag yin //
T15D4345:178b-26: ma mchu'i 'og ma ko sko ste //
T15D4345:178b-27: de ltag 'gram pa yin par bshad //
T15D4345:178b-28: sna gong mig gnyis par mtshams gdong ;
T15D4345:178b-29: / gdong gi yan lag sna khung gnyis //
T15D4345:178b-30: gdong gi ngos gnyis mkhur tshos yin //
T15D4345:178b-31: de bar dma' ba mchi ma'i stan //
T15D4345:178b-32: de dag rnams kyi gong na mig / mig 'bras 'gegs pa mig mchu yin //
T15D4345:178b-33: mig mtha'i dkar po mig sprin yin //
T15D4345:178b-34: de dbus zlum nag mthong mig yin //
T15D4345:178b-35: mthong mig nag po zlum po'i dbus //
T15D4345:178b-36: phra zhing dad ba mig rgyal bong //
T15D4345:178b-37: mig ltag gnyis ni mig gi skyu //
T15D4345:178b-38: de steng smin ma gnyis yin no //
T15D4345:178b-39: mig gi rgya ba ni mig zur te //
T15D4345:178b-40: nang gi mtshams ni mig phugs yin //
T15D4345:178b-41: smin ma gnyis re dpral ba ste ;
T15D4345:178b-42: / dpral ba'i steng gi dpral mtshams yin //
T15D4345:178b-43: de steng spyi bo yin par bshad //
T15D4345:178b-44: rna ba 'ang gnyis par glad pa ste //
T15D4345:178b-45: mig zur mig 'gram bar mur gong //
T15D4345:178b-46: mur gong rna ba'i bar mur 'gram //
T15D4345:178b-47: mkhur tshos gnyis kyi rgyab za yung //
T15D4345:179a-2: 'gram pa srol gong gnyis kyi bar //
T15D4345:179a-3: lkog ma zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T15D4345:179a-4: rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang rgyab //
T15D4345:179a-5: rna ltag dang ni rna mchan yin //
T15D4345:179a-6: mgo dang phrag so'i bar ske mgrin //
T15D4345:179a-7: ske mgrin phrag po'i ltag ske rtsa //
T15D4345:179a-8: de steng rngog g-yab yin par bshad //
T15D4345:179a-9: rngog mtha' rna ba'i bar phum phum //
T15D4345:179a-10: rngog g-yab mtha' ni ze'u ltag ste //
T15D4345:179a-11: de yi rgyab ni dang ru yin //
T15D4345:179a-12: dang ru'i 'og ni nam tsong zhes //
T15D4345:179a-13: rta rnams la ni bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:179a-15: ze'u yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:179a-16: ze'u'i rjes thogs kho na la //
T15D4345:179a-17: sga 'og yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:179a-18: de phan cad ni sga la tshigs dang //
T15D4345:179a-19: rgyab nyid yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:179a-20: ze'u'i so gnyis phrag so ste //
T15D4345:179a-21: phrag so'i rtsa ba dpung mgo yin //
T15D4345:179a-22: lkog ma dang ni srol gong bar //
T15D4345:179a-23: mid pa'o de 'og srol mdud yin //
T15D4345:179a-24: mid 'og lag par brang yin te //
T15D4345:179a-25: de rjes lag 'og bar snying ga / de 'og dpung sna dpung pa yin //
T15D4345:179a-26: dpung pa'i nang ni mchan khung phan //
T15D4345:179a-27: rgyab kyi cha ni dpung rgyab yin //
T15D4345:179a-28: de 'og bus mo gnyis kyi ltag / bus gong dang ni lag ngar gnyis //
T15D4345:179a-29: pus mo'i 'og tu chig grang ste ;
T15D4345:179a-30: / de 'og chig grang phra mo yin //
T15D4345:179a-31: chig grang sbom phra'i bar na ni //
T15D4345:179a-32: chig grang nang ste de 'og gi / mdun gyi cha ni tshe'u gdong yin //
T15D4345:179a-33: rgyab ni tshe'u spur shes par bya //
T15D4345:179a-34: de'i ltag de ni sgrog mkhar yin //
T15D4345:179a-35: de'i yang 'og na yod pa yi //
T15D4345:179a-36: tshe'u che zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T15D4345:179a-37: de'i 'og rmig pa'i mtshams yin la //
T15D4345:179a-38: de yi 'og tu rmig pa yin //
T15D4345:179a-39: rmig pa'i mtha' ma rmig sgros yin //
T15D4345:179a-40: rmig pa'i 'og ni rmig mthil te //
T15D4345:179a-41: rmig mthil nang mtha' sbal ba'i mtshams //
T15D4345:179a-42: rmig mthil dbus ni sbal ba yin //
T15D4345:179a-43: dpung mtha'i mgon snying yod de //
T15D4345:179a-44: de yi ngos ni rtsib logs yin //
T15D4345:179a-45: rtsi ba logs 'og tu dku yin la //
T15D4345:179a-46: de yi steng ni sga 'dab yin //
T15D4345:179a-47: sgal tshigs kyi ni cha dag gi / mtshams ni ro smad yin par bshad //
T15D4345:179a-48: rus pa gsum ni 'dus pa yi //
T15D4345:179a-49: sum mdo mjug do yin par bshad //
T15D4345:179b-0: mjug do'i 'og tu aong @179b do sta //
T15D4345:179b-1: de rjes rnga rtsa yin par bshad //
T15D4345:179b-2: de yi ngos gnyis dpyi steng yin //
T15D4345:179b-3: dpyi steng 'og ni ro hi ni //
T15D4345:179b-4: bar na rnga ma rnga snying bcas //
T15D4345:179b-5: de gnyis 'og ni brla dpyi'i mtshams //
T15D4345:179b-6: rnga rtsa'i 'og ni rkub yin la //
T15D4345:179b-7: de yi ngos gnyis rkub tshos yin //
T15D4345:179b-9: de dag bar ni mjug srub yin //
T15D4345:179b-10: brla yi yang na rlig pa ste //
T15D4345:179b-11: rlig pa dang 'brel mtshan yin no //
T15D4345:179b-12: de gnyis mdun na rmong kha ste //
T15D4345:179b-13: rmong kha snying de'i dbus lte ba //
T15D4345:179b-14: dku yang bar na gnas pa yin //
T15D4345:179b-15: dku na lte ba'i bar na rgyu //
T15D4345:179b-16: rgyab dang dku yi bar ran 'dra ;
T15D4345:179b-17: / ran 'dra'i 'og ni sdu gu mig / de yi pha rol dpyi yin te //
T15D4345:179b-18: de yi 'og ma brla yin no //
T15D4345:179b-19: de yi yang 'og brla phra mo //
T15D4345:179b-20: de yi 'og ni rje ngar yin //
T15D4345:179b-21: de 'og sre long chig grang yin //
T15D4345:179b-22: lhag ma ro stod rjes 'brangs te //
T15D4345:179b-23: thams cad nye bar dbye bar bya //
T15D4345:179b-24: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las bstan pa rnams bshad pa ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T15D4345:179b-26: // / rta yi tshe yi rig byed mkhan //
T15D4345:179b-27: drang srong mgyogs 'gro'i gnyen gyur pa //
T15D4345:179b-28: sha li ho tra dbang thul la //
T15D4345:179b-29: mdza' las rgyal gyis yongs dris pa //
T15D4345:179b-30: rta yi tshul gyi de nyid mkhyen ;
T15D4345:179b-31: / tshad ni rnam pa du ru bshad //
T15D4345:179b-32: mi sdug gzhal min gang zhig lags //
T15D4345:179b-33: sdug cing gzhal bzod gang zhig lags //
T15D4345:179b-34: yan lag nyid lag shes pa dang //
T15D4345:179b-35: grangs nyid kyi ni bye brag rnams //
T15D4345:179b-36: bdag cag blo gros zhan pas na //
T15D4345:179b-37: legs ldan khyod las mnyan par 'tshal //
T15D4345:179b-38: de skad smras tshe slob dpon gyur //
T15D4345:179b-39: drang srong dam pas slar smras pa //
T15D4345:179b-40: ji skad bstan pa 'di mnyan nas //
T15D4345:179b-41: mdza' las rgyal gyis bzung bar gyis //
T15D4345:179b-42: sgur zhing gdong dang ske ba zhum //
T15D4345:179b-43: 'khums dang shin tu rgyas drags dang //
T15D4345:179b-44: 'dug dang dbang po yul gyi gnas //
T15D4345:179b-45: de bzhin brang ni 'phyugs pa dang //
T15D4345:179b-46: rked pa skrongs par gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:179b-47: shin tu dma' dang shin tu mtho //
T15D4345:179b-48: gang zhig lus stod shin tu che //
T15D4345:179b-49: de bzhin rgya ba ni lhag par dma' //
T15D4345:179b-50: lus ni shin tu mi snyug dang //
T15D4345:179b-51: de bzhin rked pa zhum pa ste //
T15D4345:180a-2: gzhal min yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:180a-3: stobs ma nyams shing mdzes pa yi //
T15D4345:180a-4: lus ldan rta ni bco lnga pa //
T15D4345:180a-5: lus kyi chu zhing legs gnas shing //
T15D4345:180a-6: gnas kyi cha ni ma 'phyugs pa //
T15D4345:180a-7: tshod shes pa yi gzhal bya yin //
T15D4345:180a-8: gzugs ngan nam yang mi gzhal lo //
T15D4345:180a-9: ske mgrin lus ni cha mnyam zhing //
T15D4345:180a-10: rnga snying mgo dang mnyam pa dang //
T15D4345:180a-11: aong do dang ni brang zheng mnyam //
T15D4345:180a-12: pus mo'i tshe'u mnyam pa dang //
T15D4345:180a-13: dpangs dang zhing gi tshad dang ni //
T15D4345:180a-14: legs pa snyoms par gyur pa'i rta //
T15D4345:180a-15: de 'dra'i tshad dang ldan pa dag / cha mnyam yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:180a-16: rta ni lus kyi cha mnyam pa'i //
T15D4345:180a-17: tshad ni rnam gsum mnyan par gyis //
T15D4345:180a-18: rta mchog gi ni dpral ba la //
T15D4345:180a-19: sor ni bcu gnyis yod par bshad //
T15D4345:180a-20: rna ba sor drug yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:180a-21: so dag sor ni phyed dang gnyis //
T15D4345:180a-22: mig ni sor gsum shes par bya //
T15D4345:180a-23: mche ba'i dpangs ni sor gnyis yin //
T15D4345:180a-24: mgo bo sor ni nyi shu brgyad //
T15D4345:180a-25: phum phum gnas ni dpangs sor gsum //
T15D4345:180a-26: rta mchog gi ni chu ru ni //
T15D4345:180a-27: sor brgya rtsa bzhi nyid yin no //
T15D4345:180a-28: ske mgrin sor ni sum cu ste //
T15D4345:180a-29: ze'u ltag sor ni drug yin la //
T15D4345:180a-30: rgyab ni sum cur shes par bya //
T15D4345:180a-31: aong do gdong pa dag dang mnyam //
T15D4345:180a-32: 'breg ni sor ni bcu yin te //
T15D4345:180a-33: 'di ni chu yi tshad du bshad //
T15D4345:180a-34: rlig pa bil ba bzang po yi //
T15D4345:180a-35: tshad tsam yod par shes par bya //
T15D4345:180a-36: rta mchog gi ni mtshan dag la //
T15D4345:180a-37: sor ni bcu drug yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:180a-38: phrag so sor ni nyi shu drug / dpung mgo nyid ni sor bcu yin //
T15D4345:180a-39: dpung pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180a-40: pus mo'i tshigs ni sor drug pa //
T15D4345:180a-41: tshe'u spu sor drug yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:180a-42: chig grang dkyus su sor bcu drug //
T15D4345:180a-43: tshe'u tshe sor ni drug pa yin //
T15D4345:180a-44: rmig pa'ang de dang mnyam pa yin//
T15D4345:180a-45: rked pa'i dbus kyi zheng gang yin //
T15D4345:180a-46: dpangs ni de dang mnyam pa yin //
T15D4345:180a-47: tshad ni rta mchog dag gi yin //
T15D4345:180a-48: de nas bar ma'i bshad bya ste //
T15D4345:180a-49: dpral ba'i tshad ni sor bcu yi //
T15D4345:180a-50: gdong ba sor ni nyi shu drug / mig la sor ni phyed dang gsum //
T15D4345:180b-0: phum phum gnas kyang de dang @180b 'dra //
T15D4345:180b-1: so la sor gcig bzhi cha gcig / mche ba sor gcig bzhi cha gsum //
T15D4345:180b-2: rna ba'i dpangs su sor lnga ru //
T15D4345:180b-3: rta ni bar ma'i yin par bshad //
T15D4345:180b-4: ske mgrin nyi shu rtsa bdun du //
T15D4345:180b-5: bstan bcos rtogs pas shes par bya //
T15D4345:180b-6: rngog mtha' sor ni lnga ru bshad //
T15D4345:180b-7: rgyab ni ske mgrin dag dang mnyam //
T15D4345:180b-8: 'breg la sor ni bdun yin te //
T15D4345:180b-9: aong do nyi shu rtsa drug yin //
T15D4345:180b-10: bar ma 'di yi chu ru ni //
T15D4345:180b-11: sor ni dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yin //
T15D4345:180b-12: mgo bo sor ni nyi shu drug /'di yi rnga snying de dang mnyam //
T15D4345:180b-13: bar ma rlig pa'i tshad dag ni //
T15D4345:180b-14: bil ba 'bring po tsam yin no //
T15D4345:180b-15: bar gyi mtshan gyi tshad dag ni //
T15D4345:180b-16: sor ni bcu bzhi yin par bshad //
T15D4345:180b-17: dpangs su sor ni bcu dgu dag /'di la bsngags par gyur pa yin //
T15D4345:180b-18: phrag sor sor ni nyi shu lnga //
T15D4345:180b-19: dpung mgo sor ni brgyad yin no //
T15D4345:180b-20: dpung ba sor ni nyi shu gsum //
T15D4345:180b-21: pus mo tshe'u dang mnyam pa yin ;
T15D4345:180b-22: / chig grang sor ni bcu bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180b-23: tshe'u spu sor ni lnga pa yin //
T15D4345:180b-24: tshe'u tshe'ang sor ni lnga pa ste //
T15D4345:180b-25: rmig pa'ang de dang 'dra par bshad //
T15D4345:180b-26: rta yi tha ma dag gi tshad //
T15D4345:180b-27: dpral ba sor ni brgyad yin te //
T15D4345:180b-28: mgo bo sor ni nyi shu bzhi //
T15D4345:180b-29: mig ni sor gnyis yin shes bya //
T15D4345:180b-30: phum phum gnas kyang de dang 'dra //
T15D4345:180b-31: mche ba sor ni phyed dang gnyis //
T15D4345:180b-32: so yi dpangs su sor gcig yin //
T15D4345:180b-33: rna ba'i dpangs ni sor bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180b-34: skra 'gram nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180b-35: rngog mtha' sor ni bzhi yin no //
T15D4345:180b-36: rgyang ni ske ba nyid dang mnyam //
T15D4345:180b-37: 'breg gi chad ni sor bzhi ste ;
T15D4345:180b-38: / aong do sor ni nyi shu bzhi //
T15D4345:180b-39: chu ru sor ni brgyad cu yin //
T15D4345:180b-40: mgo po nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180b-41: rnga snying dag kyang de dang mnyam //
T15D4345:180b-42: rlig ba bil ba chung du tsam //
T15D4345:180b-43: pho mtshan sor ni bcu gnyis yin //
T15D4345:180b-44: rta ni tha ma'i dpangs su ni //
T15D4345:180b-45: sor ni brgyad du yin par bshad //
T15D4345:180b-46: phrag so sor ni nyi shu bzhi //
T15D4345:180b-47: dpung mgo 'di yi sor drug yin //
T15D4345:180b-48: dpung pa sor ni nyi shu gnyis //
T15D4345:180b-49: pus mo sor ni bzhi yin la //
T15D4345:180b-50: rta ni tha ma'i chig grang gi / dpangs ni sor bcu gnyis yin no //
T15D4345:180b-51: tshe'u spu'i gnas ni sor bzhi ste //
T15D4345:180b-52: tshe'u tshe'i rmig pa de dang 'dra //
T15D4345:181a-2: cha ni ci bzhin gzhag pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-3: ro stod kyi ni dpangs gang yin //
T15D4345:181a-4: 'og nas rngog mtha'i bar du gzhal //
T15D4345:181a-5: ro smad 'jug do'i mtshams nas ni //
T15D4345:181a-6: 'og nas steng du de bzhin gzhal //
T15D4345:181a-7: de ltar dpangs su gzhal nas ni ;
T15D4345:181a-8: / bstan bcos mkhas pas bya ba yin //
T15D4345:181a-9: rnga snying rtsa nas mig zur gyi //
T15D4345:181a-10: bar du chur ni gzhal bar bya //
T15D4345:181a-11: dpyi steng mjug to dpyi mgul dang //
T15D4345:181a-12: brla dpyi'i mtshams ni gang yin pa //
T15D4345:181a-13: mchog dang bar ma tha ma la'ang //
T15D4345:181a-14: phrag so dang ni mnyam pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-15: rje ngar dpyi yi ba ha las //
T15D4345:181a-16: sor gcig gis ni chung bar bshad //
T15D4345:181a-17: spu ra pus mo'i tshad las ni //
T15D4345:181a-18: sor gcig lhag par shes par bya //
T15D4345:181a-19: chig grang la sogs sngar bshad pa //
T15D4345:181a-20: phyi rkang gi yang de 'drar ldan //
T15D4345:181a-21: nas rgyas kyi ni lto gshibs pa'i //
T15D4345:181a-22: zheng ni sor du shes par bya //
T15D4345:181a-23: la la mthe bo'i tshigs kyi zheng //
T15D4345:181a-24: sor yin par ni 'chad par byed //
T15D4345:181a-25: gzhan dag skyes bu ran pa yi //
T15D4345:181a-26: lag sor gyi ni gung mo yi //
T15D4345:181a-27: tshigs ni dbus ma'i nang dag la //
T15D4345:181a-28: sor min par ni 'dod pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-29: rta gzhan gang dag yod pa dag / tshad 'di yis sna gzhal bar bya //
T15D4345:181a-30: de ltar mchog dang bar ma dang //
T15D4345:181a-31: tha mar gyur pa'i rta gsum la //
T15D4345:181a-32: tshad ni rnam pa gsum dag gis //
T15D4345:181a-33: gzhal bar 'di ni bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-34: de ltar chu zheng tshad ldan pa'i //
T15D4345:181a-35: lus dang ldan pa gang zhig yin //
T15D4345:181a-36: lus dang 'tsham par sha rgyas shing //
T15D4345:181a-37: rkang pa sra la mtshan dang ldan //
T15D4345:181a-38: yan lag gsal zhing mnyan pa dang //
T15D4345:181a-39: lus snyoms sha ni mkhregs pa dag / bkra shis dpal skyed dge ba dang //
T15D4345:181a-40: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin byed yin //
T15D4345:181a-41: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las tshad gzhal ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T15D4345:181a-44: // / de nas gzhan yang yan lag bcu'i //
T15D4345:181a-45: cha yi le'u bshad par bya //
T15D4345:181a-46: dang po'i gnas ni dpral ba yin //
T15D4345:181a-47: mthar thug tshad du bshad pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-48: gnyis pa dpral ba'i steng gi ni //
T15D4345:181a-49: glad pa la ni brten pa yin //
T15D4345:181a-50: gsum pa ske mgrin phrag so yi //
T15D4345:181b-0: lus kyi phyogs ni yin @181b par bshad //
T15D4345:181b-2: dpung mgo de bzhin phrag so dang //
T15D4345:181b-3: sog pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa //
T15D4345:181b-4: bzhi pa dag ni yin par 'dod //
T15D4345:181b-5: lus kyi ro stod cha mnyam dang //
T15D4345:181b-6: dpung sna la sogs lnga po yin //
T15D4345:181b-7: snying ga lag 'og rtsi ba logs dang //
T15D4345:181b-8: sga 'og dang ni rgyab nyid ni //
T15D4345:181b-9: rta yi gnas ni drug pa yin //
T15D4345:181b-10: sgal tshigs dang ni lto ba dang //
T15D4345:181b-11: mtshan gyi nye 'khor gang yin dang //
T15D4345:181b-12: rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin rnams //
T15D4345:181b-13: gnas ni bdun pa dag tu bshad //
T15D4345:181b-14: aod do'i phyogs na gang yod dang //
T15D4345:181b-15: brla gnyis dang ni bcas pa dag / de dag gnas ni brgyad pa yin //
T15D4345:181b-16: dpung pa dpung rgyab pus mo dang //
T15D4345:181b-17: rkub tshos dpyi mgul dpyi mtshams dang //
T15D4345:181b-18: rje ngar dang ni bcas pa dang //
T15D4345:181b-19: gnas ni dgu pa yin par 'dod //
T15D4345:181b-20: pus mo rje ngar man chad ni //
T15D4345:181b-21: gnas ni bcu pa zhes bya'o //
T15D4345:181b-22: dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba ;
T15D4345:181b-23: / thams cad kyang ni mtshon par bya //
T15D4345:181b-24: gnas skabs cha yi 'bras bu dag / de yi rtag tu brjod bya min //
T15D4345:181b-25: de bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yi //
T15D4345:181b-26: rta yi tshad la sogs pa'ang bshad //
T15D4345:181b-27: gnas shes pa yi gnas rnams ni //
T15D4345:181b-28: rtogs par byas la'ang 'bras bu brjod //
T15D4345:181b-29: tshe dang na tshod cha rnams ni //
T15D4345:181b-30: gnas las shes par byas te bstan //
T15D4345:181b-31: mtshan nyid ldan na 'bras bur bcas //
T15D4345:181b-32: go bzlog pa ni 'bras bu med //
T15D4345:181b-33: mtshan nyid gnas ni 'khrug pa las //
T15D4345:181b-35: mdog dang gzi mdangs snying stobs dri //
T15D4345:181b-36: ci bzhin dus su 'bras bu ster //
T15D4345:181b-37: lus kyi 'gros dang skad dang ni //
T15D4345:181b-39: thig le dang ni gtsug gi ni //
T15D4345:181b-40: gnas skabs cha ni 'di las byung //
T15D4345:181b-41: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las yan lag bcu'i cha dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T15D4345:181b-44: // / legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas //
T15D4345:181b-45: sha li ho tra la dris pa //
T15D4345:181b-46: mi sdug ci ltar shes par gyis //
T15D4345:181b-47: ji bzhin sdug pa ji lta bu //
T15D4345:181b-48: dman dang de bzhin mi dman dang //
T15D4345:181b-49: yan lag tshang dang mi tshang dang //
T15D4345:181b-50: gzhal bya nyid dang gzhal min dang //
T15D4345:181b-51: gso sla gso dka' ji lta bu//
T15D4345:182a-0: @182a * // de ltar bu yis dris pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-1: sha li ho tras slar smras pa //
T15D4345:182a-2: so so'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba //
T15D4345:182a-3: de dag khyed la bshad par bya //
T15D4345:182a-4: gang yang lus kyi dbyibs legs shing //
T15D4345:182a-5: rtsa rgyus snang bar mi 'gyur dang //
T15D4345:182a-6: chu zheng tshad dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-7: sha ni gnas dang 'tsham par skyes //
T15D4345:182a-8: lus snyoms gsus pa chung ba dang //
T15D4345:182a-9: yid dang mig ni dga' byed pa //
T15D4345:182a-10: ro smad mnyam zhing zlum pa dang /
T15D4345:182a-11: mdzes shing dbyibs ni legs gnas dang //
T15D4345:182a-12: yan lag nyid lag rdzogs pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-13: yan lag kun gyi dbyibs legs dang //
T15D4345:182a-14: nying lag rnams ni mi sdug dang //
T15D4345:182a-15: mgyogs shing mnyam dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-16: des shing stobs dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-17: na tshod gzhon zhing 'gros che dang //
T15D4345:182a-18: ske mgrin phrag so brang gi phyogs //
T15D4345:182a-19: sha rgyas tshad dang ldan la sogs //
T15D4345:182a-20: 'di dag gzhal bya cha mnyam dang //
T15D4345:182a-21: gso sla mi sdug med pa yin //
T15D4345:182a-22: de las bzlog par gyur ba'i rta //
T15D4345:182a-23: gzhal bya'i las dag ma yin no //
T15D4345:182a-24: de lta'i mi sdug la sogs dang //
T15D4345:182a-25: ldan pa'i rta ni gang yin pa //
T15D4345:182a-26: shing rta lam dang khal dang ni //
T15D4345:182a-27: rtsed mo'i gnas dang g-yul dag tu //
T15D4345:182a-28: las dang 'tsham pa ma yin pas //
T15D4345:182a-29: de phyir de ni spang bar bya //
T15D4345:182a-30: de phyir bzang po shes byas la //
T15D4345:182a-31: de lta'i rta ni blang bar bya //
T15D4345:182a-32: de ltar blang 'os blangs nas ni //
T15D4345:182a-33: lhag ma spang bya rnam par spang //
T15D4345:182a-34: tshong pa rnams la rta dag ni //
T15D4345:182a-35: bzang po blang bar gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:182a-36: spris ma bshugs pa'i zho lta bur //
T15D4345:182a-37: lhag ma snying po med pa yin //
T15D4345:182a-38: de lta mod kyi brtse ba yis //
T15D4345:182a-39: spang bya de yang tshong ba dang //
T15D4345:182a-40: rta la brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
T15D4345:182a-41: blangs te sbyin pa gtang bar bya //
T15D4345:182a-42: mtshan ni ngan par gyur na yang //
T15D4345:182a-43: mgyogs shing rigs dang na tshod ldan //
T15D4345:182a-44: rgyal pos lhag gang rnams dang ni //
T15D4345:182a-45: bram ze la ni sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:182a-46: ma ning rgan dang nad kyis nyen //
T15D4345:182a-47: nye 'khor gnas pa'i mi la sbyin //
T15D4345:182a-48: rlig pa med dang rlig gcig pa //
T15D4345:182a-49: rlig ser dang ni lus skems dang //
T15D4345:182b-0: yan lag ma tshang gyur pa dag / nyung rum la sogs rnams la @182b sbyin ;
T15D4345:182b-1: / g-yul du 'jug par mi nus pa //
T15D4345:182b-2: gar mkhan dang ni glu mkhan dang //
T15D4345:182b-4: de 'dra'i tshul ldan dag la sbyin //
T15D4345:182b-5: de la shin tu mi sdug pa //
T15D4345:182b-6: shin tu bzang ba mi sbyin no //
T15D4345:182b-7: shu la ka dang gzugs mi sdug / so mi sdug dang mi srun pa //
T15D4345:182b-8: nye 'khor gyi ni pho nya sogs //
T15D4345:182b-9: drag shul byed pa rnams la sbyin //
T15D4345:182b-10: 'gro sa chung ba dang sbegs pa dang //
T15D4345:182b-11: rkang ngan glas kyi nang mir sbyin //
T15D4345:182b-12: rta la gdug par gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:182b-13: mtshams srung mtha' 'khob pa dag dang //
T15D4345:182b-14: nyes pa cher bsten dag la sbyin //
T15D4345:182b-15: rang gi yul du de mi gzhag / de rnams rtog la mkhas pa ni //
T15D4345:182b-16: rgyal po'i drung du rtag par gzhag / de ltar rta ni rnam phye na //
T15D4345:182b-18: yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba dang //
T15D4345:182b-19: g-yul dang dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:182b-20: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las sdug pa dang
T15D4345:182b-21: mi sdug pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu
T15D4345:182b-22: gsum pa'o // nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba yi //
T15D4345:182b-23: drang srong pha la phyag byas te //
T15D4345:182b-24: legs thos kyis ni zas kyi tshad //
T15D4345:182b-25: rnam par brtag pa dris gyur pa //
T15D4345:182b-26: legs ldan mi la zas kyi tshad //
T15D4345:182b-27: bshad kyis rta la ci zhig 'tshal//
T15D4345:182b-28: phyugs rnams dang ni khyad par du //
T15D4345:182b-29: rta la de gso ma mchis te //
T15D4345:182b-30: de rnams dbugs 'byin tsam gyis ni //
T15D4345:182b-31: zos shing bcas pa 'ju gyur la //
T15D4345:182b-32: phyugs ni lto bar grags pas na //
T15D4345:182b-33: de la tshad ni ci zhig bgyi //
T15D4345:182b-34: de skad legs thos kyis smras tshe //
T15D4345:182b-35: sha li ho tras slar smras pa//
T15D4345:182b-36: blo gros bzang po nan tan du //
T15D4345:182b-37: shin tu 'drangs kyang tshad tsam du //
T15D4345:182b-38: byin na dga' ba skyed byed cing //
T15D4345:182b-39: tshod zin dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T15D4345:182b-40: tshod ma zin na bdud rtsis kyang //
T15D4345:182b-41: gsod par 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
T15D4345:182b-42: bde zhing gso la 'tsho byed pas //
T15D4345:182b-44: / de med srog mtha'i 'jigs bskyed la //
T15D4345:182b-45: de dang ldan na gnas mchog 'gyur //
T15D4345:182b-46: rta ni mang du za bas na //
T15D4345:182b-47: tshad kyi dgos pa bden mod kyi //
T15D4345:182b-48: sman dang zas skom cho ga ni //
T15D4345:182b-49: 'gro ngan bong bu la yang dgos //
T15D4345:182b-50: tshod ma zin na sman gyis kyang //
T15D4345:183a-2: tshod dang ldan pa byas pa yis //
T15D4345:183a-3: dug gis kyang ni nad 'joms so //
T15D4345:183a-4: rdzas dang 'ju stobs rdzas ci yang //
T15D4345:183a-5: tshad ni rnam pa gsum la 'jug / snying dga' shugs ni ma bkag dang //
T15D4345:183a-6: lto la shin tu mi gnod dang //
T15D4345:183a-7: rtsib logs rnams ni bde ba dang //
T15D4345:183a-8: gsus pa tshim bar ma gyur la //
T15D4345:183a-9: bkres dang skom ni zhi ba dang //
T15D4345:183a-10: dbang po rnams ni tshim pa dang //
T15D4345:183a-11: dbugs rngub dbugs dbyung bde ba dang //
T15D4345:183a-12: gnyid ni bde bar log byed dang //
T15D4345:183a-13: stobs dang kha dog 'phel byed dang //
T15D4345:183a-15: lus gzungs 'khrug par mi byed pa //
T15D4345:183a-16: tshod zin zos pa yin par bshad //
T15D4345:183a-17: kha zas lci bas lto ba yi //
T15D4345:183a-18: phyed dam sum cha bkang ba bsngags //
T15D4345:183a-19: kha zas shin tu yang ba yang //
T15D4345:183a-20: shin tu 'drangs par mi sbyin no //
T15D4345:183a-21: de ltar tshad las tshad min par //
T15D4345:183a-22: lhag pa'am chung par gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:183a-23: stobs dang snying stobs blo dang ni //
T15D4345:183a-24: mdog dang dbang po la gnod byed //
T15D4345:183a-25: rlung ni 'gags pa'am sbyor bar byed //
T15D4345:183a-26: nad skyed byed pa'i mchog yin la //
T15D4345:183a-27: ro mi tsa zhing tshe thung dang //
T15D4345:183a-28: mdangs med bkra mi shis par 'gyur //
T15D4345:183a-29: de bas rta rnams log pa yi //
T15D4345:183a-30: zas la spyod lam bzlog par bya //
T15D4345:183a-31: 'drangs drags par ni gyur pa las //
T15D4345:183a-32: nad gzhi thams cad 'khrug byed cing //
T15D4345:183a-33: gsud dang pho ba'i nad skyes pas //
T15D4345:183a-34: rta ni de las bzlog par bya //
T15D4345:183a-35: ji tsam gyis ni lto ba'i me //
T15D4345:183a-36: 'bar gyur de tsam sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:183a-37: tshad mi ldan par byin pa yis //
T15D4345:183a-38: yang na drags pa'am chung bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:183a-39: rdzas ni chu skyes rlan can dang //
T15D4345:183a-40: skam par skye ste gsum du 'dod //
T15D4345:183a-41: de dag tshad mi ldan par ni //
T15D4345:183a-42: bza' ba'i bya ba'ang tha dad do //
T15D4345:183a-43: mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam zas sogs //
T15D4345:183a-44: tshad mi ldan dang 'dra ba yi //
T15D4345:183a-45: zas kyi smos kyi skom mam ni //
T15D4345:183a-46: snum mam rtsva yi tshod dang ni //
T15D4345:183a-47: grang lhags 'dren pa drags pas kyang //
T15D4345:183a-48: tshad mi ldan par gnod pa skyed //
T15D4345:183a-49: de bas spyi dang khyad par gyi //
T15D4345:183a-50: tshad ni nga yis bshad par bya //
T15D4345:183a-51: 'o lam se bzhi ma sha bzhi //
T15D4345:183a-52: de bzhi la ni sha na ste //
T15D4345:183b-0: de @183b bzhi la ni su ba sna //
T15D4345:183b-1: de nyid zho gnyis zhes bya'o //
T15D4345:183b-2: de bzhi la ni srang gcig ste //
T15D4345:183b-3: de bzhi la ni phul du bshad //
T15D4345:183b-4: phul bzhi la ni bre gang yin //
T15D4345:183b-5: de bzhi la ni bre bzhi ste //
T15D4345:183b-6: de bzhi la ni dre na yin //
T15D4345:183b-7: 'di ni spyi yi tshad yin la //
T15D4345:183b-8: gsher rdzas la ni nyis 'gyur bya //
T15D4345:183b-9: snum ni tshad kyi phyed du bya //
T15D4345:183b-10: aaksha lag pa'i mthil la sogs //
T15D4345:183b-11: zho gnyis kyi ni ming yin no //
T15D4345:183b-12: srang phyed ming ni aa smur bcas //
T15D4345:183b-13: srang gcig au dumw'a ra ba shad //
T15D4345:183b-14: srang gnyis khyor gang zhes byar bshad //
T15D4345:183b-15: de gnyis pa ni gnyis par bshad //
T15D4345:183b-16: de la rtsva skam dag las srang //
T15D4345:183b-17: brgyad brgya ta la ran pa yin //
T15D4345:183b-18: rlon pa de'i 'dab snye mar bcas //
T15D4345:183b-19: bzhi brgya nyin mtshan gcig la ran //
T15D4345:183b-20: thug sogs la ni bre bzhi tsam //
T15D4345:183b-21: bza' skam bre ni phye dang gnyis //
T15D4345:183b-22: snum las phul gang btung ba ni //
T15D4345:183b-23: bre gang sbyin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:183b-24: sbrang rtsi las ni phul gang sbyin //
T15D4345:183b-25: bu ram las ni srang brgyad sbyin //
T15D4345:183b-26: hvags dang kha ra gang yin pa //
T15D4345:183b-27: srang ni bcu yi tshad du sbyin //
T15D4345:183b-28: sna sman khu ba phul gang ste //
T15D4345:183b-29: snum gyi sna sman de yi phyed //
T15D4345:183b-30: du bas bdug la zho drug ste //
T15D4345:183b-31: du ba drag po zho gnyis tshad //
T15D4345:183b-32: sman kha'i gong bu srang bzhi dag / bad kan nad la sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:183b-33: rta la dgongs ka btung bar ni //
T15D4345:183b-34: chang ni bre gang blud par bya //
T15D4345:183b-35: rta rnams la ni phye ma'i sman //
T15D4345:183b-36: btags pa srang gnyis sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:183b-37: zas dang snum ni mnyam byin tshe //
T15D4345:183b-38: skom du chang ni blud par bya //
T15D4345:183b-39: rta la lan tshva srang lnga yi //
T15D4345:183b-40: tshad du rab tu sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:183b-41: lus kun bsku byug bya ba yang //
T15D4345:183b-42: snum ni bre dang sbyar bar bya //
T15D4345:183b-43: rna ba kang la yang snum dag ni //
T15D4345:183b-44: srang gnyis nye bar gzhug par bya //
T15D4345:183b-45: bsku ba'i snum la sman las ni //
T15D4345:183b-46: srang brgya phye mar btags pa gzhug /
T15D4345:183b-47: phye las bre ni do dag dang //
T15D4345:183b-48: de ru bu ram srang brgyad gzhug / mar las phul do bsres pa yi //
T15D4345:183b-49: skyo ma dag ni sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:183b-50: chu skyes sha ni srang lnga bcu //
T15D4345:183b-51: rlan can sha ni srang bdun cu //
T15D4345:183b-52: skam pa'i sha ni srang dgu bcu //
T15D4345:183b-53: sha yi kha zas tshad yin no //
T15D4345:184a-2: srang gnyis nye bar gzhug bya zhing //
T15D4345:184a-3: snum yang srang gnyis bcug pa ni //
T15D4345:184a-4: khrag zad pa la sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:184a-5: mas gtong ba la bre gang tsam //
T15D4345:184a-6: dum bu gsum du byas te gtong //
T15D4345:184a-7: btags pa las ni srang gsum tsam //
T15D4345:184a-8: srang re ru ni bcad de gtong //
T15D4345:184a-9: 'jam rtsi phul bzhi gtang bar bya //
T15D4345:184a-10: 'jam rtsi'i gong ma phul gang gtong //
T15D4345:184a-11: mar la 'jam rtsi gtong ba ni //
T15D4345:184a-12: phul do dag ni bya bar bshad //
T15D4345:184a-13: sman ni srang bzhi'i tshad dag ni //
T15D4345:184a-14: chu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol //
T15D4345:184a-15: bzhi cha lus par byas pa dag ;
T15D4345:184a-16: /'di yi sman khu yin par bshad //
T15D4345:184a-17: chu sman bcu drug 'gyur nang du //
T15D4345:184a-18: bskol ba'i sman ni srang brgya gzhug / snum yang srang brgya bcug nas ni //
T15D4345:184a-19: bzhi cha cha gsum bsrub par bya //
T15D4345:184a-20: der ni snum gyi bzhi cha yi //
T15D4345:184a-21: sman phye bcug la lde gur bya //
T15D4345:184a-22: de la sha khu 'o ma ni //
T15D4345:184a-23: chu yi bzhi cha gzhug par bya //
T15D4345:184a-24: bskol chu sman dang spyar ba yang //
T15D4345:184a-25: zhag lon pa ni spang bar bya //
T15D4345:184a-26: bu ram bsil du 'dod pa dang //
T15D4345:184a-27: bsregs na sgra mi 'byung ba yi //
T15D4345:184a-28: mtshan ma de dang dang bar ni //
T15D4345:184a-29: snang na thob la dpog par bya //
T15D4345:184a-30: de ni tshos pa yin pa'i phyir //
T15D4345:184a-31: snum de slar ni dbab par bya //
T15D4345:184a-32: de ni btsags par gyur na ni //
T15D4345:184a-33: yon tan lhag par 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:184a-34: snum zhing dang bar 'gyur ba dang //
T15D4345:184a-35: gsal bar gyur na mkhas pa yis //
T15D4345:184a-36: snum de mdog ni phyin pa'i phyir //
T15D4345:184a-37: tshos pa yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:184a-39: ma tshos chu dang 'dres pa dang //
T15D4345:184a-40: tshos drags nag por gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:184a-41: nad kun 'khrugs par byed pa yin //
T15D4345:184a-42: rma dang sna sman 'jam rtsi la //
T15D4345:184a-43: 'jam par tshos pa gtang bar bya //
T15D4345:184a-44: bsku la tshos drags btung ba la //
T15D4345:184a-45: bar ma tsam ni bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:184a-46: ma tshos snum ni nad skyed la //
T15D4345:184a-47: tshos drags phan pa med pa yin //
T15D4345:184a-48: legs par tshos pa'i snum dag ni //
T15D4345:184a-49: rta yi nad ni 'jig byed yin //
T15D4345:184a-50: rlung mkhris bad kan sel ba'i snum //
T15D4345:184a-51: btung dang bsku dang sna sman dang //
T15D4345:184b-0: rma dang 'jam rtsi @184b las rnams te //
T15D4345:184b-1: rnam pa lnga la gtang bar bya //
T15D4345:184b-2: tshad 'di dag ni rta rnams las //
T15D4345:184b-3: mchog gi yin par shes par bya //
T15D4345:184b-4: bar ma la ni bzhi cha dbri //
T15D4345:184b-5: tha ma la ni phyed dbri'o //
T15D4345:184b-6: so so'i zas skom cho ga dang //
T15D4345:184b-7: sum gyi cho ga tha dad pas //
T15D4345:184b-8: nad rnams zhi ba nyid 'gyur gyi //
T15D4345:184b-9: kun la gcig ni bsngags ma yin //
T15D4345:184b-11: zla ba'i 'od zer nyid yin la //
T15D4345:184b-12: nyi ma'i zer gyis padma ni //
T15D4345:184b-13: kha 'byed par ni snang ba yin //
T15D4345:184b-14: tshad ni me stobs las shes bya //
T15D4345:184b-15: ji dga' sbyin par mi bya'o //
T15D4345:184b-16: me drod de yang rnam bzhi ste //
T15D4345:184b-17: rno rtul mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'o //
T15D4345:184b-18: rno bas shin tu myur du 'ju //
T15D4345:184b-19: rtul bas dka' bas 'ju ba yin //
T15D4345:184b-20: ma snyoms pas ni 'ju mi snyoms //
T15D4345:184b-21: snyoms pas 'ju ba snyoms pa yin //
T15D4345:184b-22: me drod rtul bas gzi mdangs mdog / dang po dang ni 'gros zhan 'gyur //
T15D4345:184b-23: me drod rno bas de rnams dang //
T15D4345:184b-24: ldan zhing nad ni nyung bar 'gyur //
T15D4345:184b-25: me drod snyoms pas snying stobs mdog / nad med 'gros dang skad dang ni //
T15D4345:184b-26: dbang po bde ldan nad med 'gyur //
T15D4345:184b-27: me drod mi snyoms skad dang mdog / stobs chung nad ni mang ba dang //
T15D4345:184b-28: bde ba med par 'gyur ro zhes //
T15D4345:184b-29: sha li ho tras rjes su bstan //
T15D4345:184b-30: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las tshad kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T15D4345:184b-32: // / rta bres la ni legs gnas pa'i //
T15D4345:184b-33: drang srong chen po dbang po thul //
T15D4345:184b-34: me la sbyin sreg byed brtson la //
T15D4345:184b-35: legs thos la sogs kyis dris pa //
T15D4345:184b-36: tshod shis gang gi don 'gyur zhing //
T15D4345:184b-37: gang gi yon tan skyon bshad pa //
T15D4345:184b-38: de yi zas kyi bya ba ni //
T15D4345:184b-39: lus dang des 'brel bka' stsol cig / de skad sha li ho tra la //
T15D4345:184b-40: drang srong dam pa bus dris tshe //
T15D4345:184b-41: zas kyi sbyor ba drang srong che //
T15D4345:184b-42: mdangs dang ldan pas slar smras pa //
T15D4345:184b-43: zas kyi sbyor bas kha dog mdangs //
T15D4345:184b-44: mgyogs mdzes snying stobs dran pa dang //
T15D4345:184b-45: 'drangs dang sems ni dga' ba dang //
T15D4345:184b-46: na tshod la ni 'jog pa yin //
T15D4345:185a-2: zas kyi sbyor bas bde 'gyur ba'i //
T15D4345:185a-3: sbyor ba'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T15D4345:185a-4: bshad pa de ni mnyan par gyis //
T15D4345:185a-5: me drod chung dang yid mi bde //
T15D4345:185a-6: lto ba na dang dbugs mi bde //
T15D4345:185a-7: dub cing khal gyis nyen pa dang //
T15D4345:185a-8: dug 'thungs pa dang skams pa dang ;
T15D4345:185a-9: / lam 'gro mtshan ni mi ldang dang //
T15D4345:185a-10: dub la'ang kha zas mi sbyin no //
T15D4345:185a-11: stobs ldan lci ba'i kha zas ni //
T15D4345:185a-12: de la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T15D4345:185a-13: lam gyis nyam chung gyur stobs bri //
T15D4345:185a-14: rgan dang rab gzhon dbang nyam chung //
T15D4345:185a-15: rtsa dang 'bras dang glo gcong can //
T15D4345:185a-16: zas sbyor rtag tu bya bar rigs //
T15D4345:185a-17: gang tshe phyi dro'i dus su ni //
T15D4345:185a-18: skyes bu gsum po'i grib ma lhags //
T15D4345:185a-19: cung zad lhag pa'am ma tshad pa'am //
T15D4345:185a-20: zas sbyor bya ba'i dus yin no //
T15D4345:185a-21: 'bras bre gang ni legs btsos la //
T15D4345:185a-22: de rjes tsha dang bsre bar dang //
T15D4345:185a-23: snum dang ldan par byas pa ni //
T15D4345:185a-25: dang por snum dang ldan pa yi //
T15D4345:185a-26: rjes la lan tshvar ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:185a-27: zas sbyor 'di ni skom dang dag / mi skyed legs par 'ju par 'gyur //
T15D4345:185a-28: zho dang ku langtha'i khu ba //
T15D4345:185a-29: chang dang sbrang rtsi kanydzi dang //
T15D4345:185a-30: til mar bsreg pas mnyen bya min //
T15D4345:185a-31: khu ba gzhan dang bsre mi bya //
T15D4345:185a-33: 'o ma'am yang na hvags dang ni //
T15D4345:185a-34: 'di dag mnye ba sbyin bya zhing //
T15D4345:185a-35: yang na til mar sbyar ba'ang rung //
T15D4345:185a-36: zhag dang til mar mar sbyar ba //
T15D4345:185a-37: gsum po sbyar ba zhes bya ba'ang bsku //
T15D4345:185a-38: de la sha khu mchog yin te //
T15D4345:185a-39: de dang nye bar bya ba yi //
T15D4345:185a-40: nas dang ma sha gro dang ni //
T15D4345:185a-41: drug cu ba yi sbyor ba gang //
T15D4345:185a-43: mar dang sbyar bas mnye bar bya //
T15D4345:185a-44: 'di dag dang ni mnye ba'i tshe //
T15D4345:185a-45: de ru lan tshva gzhug mi bya //
T15D4345:185a-46: rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen dang //
T15D4345:185a-47: rta yi snum mang 'thungs pa dang //
T15D4345:185a-48: me drod chung dang mi snyams dang //
T15D4345:185a-49: sbegs la lan tshvar bcas pa gtang //
T15D4345:185a-50: mnye ba'i sbyor ba bya ba dang //
T15D4345:185a-51: chang dang chang snying zho ga chus //
T15D4345:185a-52: lto ba'i ma zhu rnam sbyang zhing //
T15D4345:185a-53: kha cha'i rgyun ni 'dzag par bya //
T15D4345:185a-54: khod ba'i srin bu yod pa la //
T15D4345:185a-55: bag cin dang sbyar sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:185b-0: gang @185b zhig rgan dang lud pa can //
T15D4345:185b-1: de la kha zas skam mi sbyin //
T15D4345:185b-2: de lta bu la snum dang ni //
T15D4345:185b-3: bcas pa'i zas kyi sbyor ba bya //
T15D4345:185b-4: rta la zas ni sbyin pa ni //
T15D4345:185b-5: mgo bo gyen du legs bstan nas //
T15D4345:185b-6: zas ni kham re bcad nas ni //
T15D4345:185b-7: myur min 'gor ma med par sbyin //
T15D4345:185b-8: nas thug mar dang ldan pa'am //
T15D4345:185b-9: yang na chag tshe mar gyis spangs //
T15D4345:185b-10: rta rnams rtas byed dam pa yin //
T15D4345:185b-11: mkhris pa can la mchog tu phan //
T15D4345:185b-12: chag tshe nas thug snum med pa //
T15D4345:185b-13: lan tshva dang ni ldan pa ru //
T15D4345:185b-14: bca' lga btab par gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:185b-15: bad kan can la sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:185b-16: rgyam tsha dang ni bcas pa dang //
T15D4345:185b-17: ma sha ri la mar bcug pa //
T15D4345:185b-18: rlung nad can la phan mod kyi //
T15D4345:185b-19: de las mkhris pa skye ba bsrung //
T15D4345:185b-20: sha rnams sna tshogs dag dang ni //
T15D4345:185b-21: bad kan can la chang blud cing //
T15D4345:185b-22: mkhris pa can la 'o ma blud //
T15D4345:185b-23: rlung nad can la sha khu sbyin //
T15D4345:185b-24: mkhris pa can la rab bsil ba //
T15D4345:185b-25: rlung nad can la dro 'jam tsam //
T15D4345:185b-26: cung zad dro 'jam bad kan can //
T15D4345:185b-27: zas dang skom ni sbyin par bya //
T15D4345:185b-28: rgud cing snum ni med pa dang //
T15D4345:185b-29: yang shing tshad las chung ba ni //
T15D4345:185b-30: bad kan can la sbyin bya yi //
T15D4345:185b-31: kha zas snum pa'ang mi sbyin no //
T15D4345:185b-32: chu dron gyis ni kha bkrus la //
T15D4345:185b-33: kha 'gram legs par bltas nas ni //
T15D4345:185b-34: mnyes la sna sman btang nas ni //
T15D4345:185b-35: de yi 'og tu 'dre ru gzhug / de yi mod la rtsva mi sbyin //
T15D4345:185b-36: khyad par du ni sngo mi sbyin //
T15D4345:185b-38: chu rgal ba ni bsngags ma yin //
T15D4345:185b-39: zas sbyin 'og tu btung ba ni //
T15D4345:185b-40: chu bre phyed ni blud par bya //
T15D4345:185b-41: des ni drod sked nad gzhi sel //
T15D4345:185b-42: legs par 'ju bar byed pa yin //
T15D4345:185b-43: mgyogs shing stobs dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:185b-44: sha mkhregs dbang po brtan pa dang //
T15D4345:185b-45: khal dang khur la sran che bar //
T15D4345:185b-46: zas de yis ni 'gyur ba yin ;
T15D4345:185b-47: / rnying dang 'bu yis zos pa dang //
T15D4345:185b-48: tshig dang du bas khyer ba dang /
T15D4345:185b-49: g-yul sar char gyis nyen pa yin //
T15D4345:185b-50: rtsva ni rta la mi bsngags so //
T15D4345:185b-51: skyon med pa ni nas bas kyang //
T15D4345:185b-52: yi gar 'ong zhing zos pas sred //
T15D4345:185b-53: de nas rta yi 'tsho ba ni //
T15D4345:186a-2: ljang pa dga' zhing yi gar 'ong //
T15D4345:186a-3: me drod gzi mdangs sred 'phel byed //
T15D4345:186a-4: de phyir rta yi ljang pa yin //
T15D4345:186a-6: ljang pa tshad ldan byin na ni //
T15D4345:186a-7: nad rnams skye bar mi 'gyur zhing //
T15D4345:186a-8: rigs par ljang pa byin pa yis //
T15D4345:186a-10: bong nga spu shel tsha ba gsum //
T15D4345:186a-11: byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung //
T15D4345:186a-12: 'bras btags chang dang sbyar ba ni //
T15D4345:186a-13: mdog dang tshe ni 'phel byed mchog /'o ma mar dang ma shar bcas //
T15D4345:186a-14: til btags sbyar ba zho can yin //
T15D4345:186a-15: ma sha'i phye la lan tshvar bcas //
T15D4345:186a-16: stobs skyed byed pa gzhan dag gam //
T15D4345:186a-17: s'a lu'i phye ma'ang sbrang rtsir bcas //
T15D4345:186a-18: bi da ri dang ldan pa ni //
T15D4345:186a-19: 'o mar sbyar ba zhag gsum byin //
T15D4345:186a-20: stobs dang kha dog 'phel byed yin //
T15D4345:186a-21: zho dang skyur rdzas lan tshva dang //
T15D4345:186a-22: mar dang bcas par dkrugs pa ni //
T15D4345:186a-23: nas dang sbyar byin lus zungs bzang //
T15D4345:186a-24: stobs dang kha dog skyed byed yin //
T15D4345:186a-25: skams dang chu la rkyal ba dang //
T15D4345:186a-26: rtsva ni sngon po dag dang ni //
T15D4345:186a-27: gang zhig kha zas mngar ba dang //
T15D4345:186a-28: mar la sogs dang sbyar ba dang //
T15D4345:186a-29: sha la sogs bcas bsil ba ste //
T15D4345:186a-30: drug po 'phral du srog ster yin //
T15D4345:186a-31: 'brog tu rtsva ni sna tshogs las //
T15D4345:186a-32: rtsva gcig la ni sred pa gang //
T15D4345:186a-33: goms pas bsten pa yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:186a-34: ro yi goms ba zas sbyor las //
T15D4345:186a-35: de yi ro las shes par bya //
T15D4345:186a-37: gzhan gyis zos de gang bor dang //
T15D4345:186a-38: gang zhig rtsa nas byung ba dang //
T15D4345:186a-39: nang du rul bar gyur pa yi //
T15D4345:186a-40: rtsva ni shin tu stobs 'phrog byed //
T15D4345:186a-41: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las zas kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /
T15D4345:186a-43: // / gang zhig zas sbyor sna tshogs kyis //
T15D4345:186a-44: 'bad pa mang pos bsgrubs byas pa //
T15D4345:186a-46: ci 'dra rnam pa du zhig mchis //
T15D4345:186a-47: legs ldan de ni gsungs shig ces //
T15D4345:186a-48: de ltar legs thos kyis bskul to //
T15D4345:186a-49: sha li ho tra drang srong ches //
T15D4345:186b-0: go @186b rims de ni slar smras pa //
T15D4345:186b-1: ljang pa zas dang skom rnams dang //
T15D4345:186b-2: de bzhin mar dang snum tshogs kyis //
T15D4345:186b-3: sos par gyur tshe mdzes gyur te //
T15D4345:186b-4: de ni rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T15D4345:186b-5: brag bcas zhes bya dang po ste //
T15D4345:186b-6: gnyis ba rtsi ba logs 'gengs byed yin //
T15D4345:186b-7: gsum pa stobs ni skyed pa ste //
T15D4345:186b-8: bzhi pa sha ni rgyas pa yin //
T15D4345:186b-9: lnga pa lud pa can zhes bya //
T15D4345:186b-10: de ltar rnam pa lngar bshad do //
T15D4345:186b-11: 'di dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T15D4345:186b-12: so sor bshad kyi nyan par gyis //
T15D4345:186b-13: mtshan dang rlig pa rmong ka dang /
T15D4345:186b-14: rkub dang brang dang rtsa sbubs rnams //
T15D4345:186b-15: khrag dang sha ni srab pa yis //
T15D4345:186b-16: mnyen zhing khrag gis rgyas 'dra ba //
T15D4345:186b-17: de ni khrag bcas mdzes la gnas //
T15D4345:186b-18: rta ni gdul sbyor dag la sbyar //
T15D4345:186b-19: yan lag sha ni 'jam po yis //
T15D4345:186b-20: cung zad g-yogs par gyur pa dang //
T15D4345:186b-21: phrag so brang sogs sha skyes pa //
T15D4345:186b-22: stobs ldan rtsib logs 'gengs byed yin //
T15D4345:186b-23: rked pa brla ni sha rgyas shing //

T15D4345:196a-27: 'bras bu chen po skyed ces bya //
T15D4345:196a-28: ba spu'i mtha' ma rting pa'am //
T15D4345:196a-29: spyi bor gang zhig dkar gyur rta //
T15D4345:196a-30: de ni sngar bshad las khyad par //
T15D4345:196a-31: 'bras bu chu dun skyed par byed //
T15D4345:196a-32: pus mo'i bar du dkar ba'i rta //
T15D4345:196a-34: rta ni kha dog gzhan yod pa //
T15D4345:196a-35: rkang pa lus mdog mi mthun na //
T15D4345:196a-36: de yi 'bras bu sngar bshad pa'i //
T15D4345:196a-37: khyad par bzhin du shes par bya //
T15D4345:196a-38: gang gi lag pa gnyis dkar zhing //
T15D4345:196a-39: rkang pa gnyis ni gnag pa'am //
T15D4345:196a-40: dmar ba'i kha dog gzhan yod pa //
T15D4345:196a-41: de ni nyin mo rgyal byed yin //
T15D4345:196a-42: de las bzlog par gyur pa ni ;
T15D4345:196a-43: / mtshan mo rgyal bar byed pa yin //
T15D4345:196a-44: gang zhig kha dog dmar po'i rta //
T15D4345:196a-45: rkang pa sngo ser dkar dang gnag / yang na rmig pa sngo ba'am //
T15D4345:196a-46: ser dang dmar dang dkar dang gnag / kha dog gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi //
T15D4345:196a-47: mdog gang mdog rjes yod gyur pa //
T15D4345:196b-1: de yi rgyal po rgyal byed cing //
T15D4345:196b-2: dgra rnams thul bar byed pa dang //
T15D4345:196b-3: g-yul du rtag tu shis pa dang //
T15D4345:196b-4: nor dang bu dang tsha bor ldan //
T15D4345:196b-5: gang zhig skyes pa tshun tshang ni //
T15D4345:196b-6: rnga rngog skye bar mi 'gyur ba //
T15D4345:196b-7: bdag po rigs ni brlag byas nas //
T15D4345:196b-8: de yi rjes la ngar nyid nyams //
T15D4345:196b-9: rmong kha yi ni g-yas g-yon na //
T15D4345:196b-10: ba yi nu sor lta bu dag / yod pa
T15D4345:196b-11: de yis rgyal srid 'jig / ba glang rva 'dra
T15D4345:196b-12: ru ru yi // rva yi rtse'am pa nu 'dra //
T15D4345:196b-13: lci ba'i rtse mo lta bu'am //
T15D4345:196b-14: de bzhin pags pa'i mdzer ba'i dbyibs //
T15D4345:196b-15: yang na bil ba lta bu'am ;
T15D4345:196b-16: / lag sor lta bu'i rva dag ni //
T15D4345:196b-17: sbom po'am yang na phra mo dag / ring dang thung dang rtsub dang ljang //
T15D4345:196b-18: sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung //
T15D4345:196b-19: rna rtsa'am skra mtshams tha ma'am //
T15D4345:196b-20: dpral ba yang na spyi bo'am //
T15D4345:196b-21: de las gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu //
T15D4345:196b-22: de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod pa ;
T15D4345:196b-23: / gang byung de ni rva can de //
T15D4345:196b-25: yul phyogs gang na rta de yod //
T15D4345:196b-26: yul de rlag par 'gyur pa yin //
T15D4345:196b-27: des na de ni dgra bo yi //
T15D4345:196b-28: yul du bskyal la rjes zhi bya //
T15D4345:196b-29: rta ni gang gi ba la ni //
T15D4345:196b-30: sha khra yis ni kun du khyab //
T15D4345:196b-31: de bzhin rkub dang rlig pa dang //
T15D4345:196b-32: rna ba ngag dang mig tu byung //
T15D4345:196b-33: rta de sha khra can zhes bya //
T15D4345:196b-34: mi shis sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T15D4345:196b-35: rta bres su ni mi gzhug cing //
T15D4345:196b-36: bkra shis 'dod pas reg mi bya //
T15D4345:196b-37: mig gi nyes pa bshad bya yi //
T15D4345:196b-38: khyi mig dom dang byi ba'i mig / sbal mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang //
T15D4345:196b-39: byi ba 'ug pa nya mig can //
T15D4345:196b-40: phag dang khyu mchog lta bu'i mig / bya rog lug dang khra mig can //
T15D4345:196b-41: khra yi mig can smad pa yin //
T15D4345:196b-42: mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang //
T15D4345:196b-43: mig ser ba yang spang bar bya //
T15D4345:196b-44: des ni bdag po mi bde zhing //
T15D4345:196b-45: rigs zad pa yang byed pa yin //
T15D4345:196b-46: g-yul du bdag po pham dang gsod //
T15D4345:196b-47: rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang //
T15D4345:196b-48: dbyibs kyi 'bras bu nga yis bshad //
T15D4345:196b-49: ge sar nag po lta bu yi //
T15D4345:196b-50: thig le gang la khyab gyur pa //
T15D4345:196b-51: des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur //
T15D4345:196b-52: rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis //
T15D4345:196b-53: nor zad ge sar lta bu yis //
T15D4345:197a-1: na mi shis gyur pa yin //
T15D4345:197a-2: rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang //
T15D4345:197a-3: dmar bar gyur na bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:197a-4: shin tu dmar zhing cher khyab la //
T15D4345:197a-5: rtsub mo med la'ang 'bras bu che //
T15D4345:197a-6: snum chung dmar ba'i sha chung ba //
T15D4345:197a-7: 'bras bu chung bar shes par bya //
T15D4345:197a-8: rkan gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang //
T15D4345:197a-9: so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni //
T15D4345:197a-10: mtshan nyid gnas dang bzhi las brtag / rlig 'bras gcig pa bdag po gsod //
T15D4345:197a-11: rlig 'bras gsum pa bu gsod byed //
T15D4345:197a-12: rlig 'bras med pa bkra mi shis //
T15D4345:197a-13: rlig 'bras dmar ser nor nyams byed //
T15D4345:197a-15: g-yul du bdag po gsod par byed //
T15D4345:197a-16: rlig pa spu ni che ba 'am //
T15D4345:197a-17: yang na ser skyar gyur pa'am //
T15D4345:197a-18: de bzhin zhu bar gyur pa yang //
T15D4345:197a-19: de yis bdag po gsod byed yin //
T15D4345:197a-20: kha dog gzhan dang ldan pa la //
T15D4345:197a-21: pus mo gnyis ni nag gyur cing //
T15D4345:197a-22: sre long nag por gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:197a-23: bdag po gsod byed shes par bya //
T15D4345:197a-24: lus kyi kha dog nyid las ni //
T15D4345:197a-25: rnga ma'i kha dog gzhan gyur pa //
T15D4345:197a-26: 'bar ba'i rnga ma can zhes bya //
T15D4345:197a-27: rta de rtag tu spang bar bya //
T15D4345:197a-28: rnga ma'i rtse mo mdog gzhan gyur //
T15D4345:197a-29: yul 'khor yang ni rlag par byed //
T15D4345:197a-30: rta ni mdog dkar gyur pa la //
T15D4345:197a-31: nag po cung zad yod mi shis //
T15D4345:197a-32: rna ba dang ni rngog ma nag / rnga rtse nag por gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:197a-33: de ni rna nag yin zhes bya //
T15D4345:197a-34: las rnams kun la shis pa yin //
T15D4345:197a-35: g-yul dang lam zhugs khal bkal ba //
T15D4345:197a-36: rgyal po'i 'dod pa kun sgrub yin //
T15D4345:197a-37: rnga ma 'bar ba zhes bya dang //
T15D4345:197a-38: rnga rtse nag pa ma gtogs pa //
T15D4345:197a-39: rta ni kha dog nag pa la //
T15D4345:197a-40: dkar po cung zad yod pa shis //
T15D4345:197a-41: lham bu chu shel mdog 'dra zhing //
T15D4345:197a-42: gang gi mgo ni dkar gyur pa //
T15D4345:197a-43: rta de dpal yon can zhes bya //
T15D4345:197a-44: rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin //
T15D4345:197a-45: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'dres pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
T15D4345:197a-47: // / kha ba can gyis ri bo'i mchog /'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa //
T15D4345:197a-48: shin tu mtho zhing rtse mo che //
T15D4345:197a-49: kun nas rlung ni mi ldang zhing //
T15D4345:197a-50: rtse mo kha bas rnam par g-yogs //
T15D4345:197b-0: mi 'am ci yi glu @197b sgras khyab //
T15D4345:197b-1: bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing //
T15D4345:197b-2: ri dags sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes //
T15D4345:197b-3: sna tshogs shing gis kun du khyab //
T15D4345:197b-4: mkha' la rgyu ba rtag tu dga' //
T15D4345:197b-5: rig 'dzin tshogs ni legs gnas shing //
T15D4345:197b-6: dri za'i chogs kyis bsten par ni //
T15D4345:197b-7: sha li ho tra legs gnas la //
T15D4345:197b-8: legs thos kyis ni yang dris pas //
T15D4345:197b-9: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
T15D4345:197b-10: drang srong chen pos bdag la gsungs //
T15D4345:197b-11: rgyal po'i rta ni ci lta bu //
T15D4345:197b-12: de yi nges pa bdag la gsungs //
T15D4345:197b-13: bu yis de skad dris pa dang //
T15D4345:197b-14: sha li ho tras slar smras pa //
T15D4345:197b-15: yon tan skyon dag rgyal po la //
T15D4345:197b-17: de ltar tha ma mi rnams la //
T15D4345:197b-19: de bas rgyal po'i bzhon pa yin //
T15D4345:197b-20: mtshan nyid 'bad pas brtag par bya //
T15D4345:197b-21: ci nas nyes pa mi 'byung ba //
T15D4345:197b-22: rnam pa kun du bya ba yin //
T15D4345:197b-23: tshad dang stobs dang snying stobs gzi //
T15D4345:197b-24: stobs dang lus kyi me drod ldan //
T15D4345:197b-25: gtsug 'khyil bzang zhing mdangs rab snang //
T15D4345:197b-26: 'gros ni phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T15D4345:197b-27: skad bzang dri ni zhim pa dang //
T15D4345:197b-28: de bzhin skye gnas bzang ba dang //
T15D4345:197b-29: rig ldan ngang tshul phun sum tshogs //
T15D4345:197b-30: dul zhing mthong na dga' ba dang //
T15D4345:197b-31: bad kan rang bzhin can mchog dang //
T15D4345:197b-32: de bzhin bzang po'i skye gnas dang //
T15D4345:197b-33: smad pa'i mtshan nyid med gyur cing //
T15D4345:197b-34: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du //
T15D4345:197b-35: mtshan nyid bzang po phun tshogs pa //
T15D4345:197b-36: rab tu 'bad de brtag par bya //
T15D4345:197b-37: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
T15D4345:197b-38: rgyal po'i rta zhes bya bar bshad //
T15D4345:197b-39: gang zhig gzhan kun med pa yi //
T15D4345:197b-40: brtan pa'i gtsug ni bcu dang ldan //
T15D4345:197b-41: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
T15D4345:197b-42: ma li ka dang 'dra ba'i mig / mdog snum rab tu dkar ba'i rta //
T15D4345:197b-43: zla ba'i lha dang ldan pa yin //
T15D4345:197b-44: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
T15D4345:197b-45: sa steng dbang du byad par 'gyur //
T15D4345:197b-46: ne tsho mdog can nyi ma'i rta //
T15D4345:197b-47: rgyal po'i g-yul ngor zhon na ni //
T15D4345:197b-49: sa yang dbang du byed par 'gyur //
T15D4345:197b-50: de bzhin rgyal po'i mdog dmar rta //
T15D4345:197b-51: rnam thos sras kyi lha can te //
T15D4345:197b-52: de la bzhon na sa rnams ni //
T15D4345:198a-1: lus dbang byed the tshom med //
T15D4345:198a-2: sngo bsangs lha dbang rta yin te //
T15D4345:198a-3: mdangs snum ldan la rgyal po ni //
T15D4345:198a-4: zhon na sa ni ma lus las //
T15D4345:198a-5: rtag tu rgyal bar nges pa yin //
T15D4345:198a-6: gnag cing 'tsher ba'i mdangs dang ldan //
T15D4345:198a-7: rta mchog de ni chu lha'i yin //
T15D4345:198a-8: de la zhon na rgyal po ni //
T15D4345:198a-10: mdog dkar rna ba sngo ba dang //
T15D4345:198a-11: rngog ma dang ni rnga ma gnag / chu lha'i rta ni gnyis pa ste //
T15D4345:198a-12: de rnyed pa ni ma lus 'thob //
T15D4345:198a-13: lham bu chu shes ltar snang ba //
T15D4345:198a-14: rta ni nor lha'i yin par bshad //
T15D4345:198a-15: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
T15D4345:198a-16: myur du nor mang bdag por 'gyur //
T15D4345:198a-17: ba so'i mdog 'dra rnga ma gnag / kun nas mdangs ni snum dang ldan //
T15D4345:198a-18: chos kyi lha des de zhon na //
T15D4345:198a-19: rgyal po mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur //
T15D4345:198a-20: lung tang snum po dang 'dra ba //
T15D4345:198a-21: rta mchog de ni gshin rje'i yin //
T15D4345:198a-22: rgyal po de la zhon gyur na //
T15D4345:198a-23: myur du dgra kun las rgyal 'gyur //
T15D4345:198a-24: rma bya'i mdangs dang 'dra ba yi //
T15D4345:198a-25: ri mos khyab par gyur ba'i rta //
T15D4345:198a-26: sna tshogs lha'i yin te zhon na //
T15D4345:198a-28: de bzhin ma rgad bcag pa yi //
T15D4345:198a-29: mdog ltar shin tu dmar ba'i rta //
T15D4345:198a-30: khyab 'jug rta ste de zhon na //
T15D4345:198a-31: myur du sa ni dbang byed 'gyur //
T15D4345:198a-32: de bzhin gser dang 'dra ba la //
T15D4345:198a-33: 'tsher bas rnam par brgyan gyur pa //
T15D4345:198a-34: dbang phyug chen po'i rta zhon na //
T15D4345:198a-35: dgra rnams dbang du 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:198a-36: de bzhin shel dang 'dra ba du //
T15D4345:198a-37: dang zhing mdangs bcas lus yod pa //
T15D4345:198a-38: rnyed na mchod sbyin dam pa yi //
T15D4345:198a-39: skal ba rnyed par 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:198a-40: gang zhig nag la mgo bo dang //
T15D4345:198a-41: rkang pa bzhi ni dkar gyur pa //
T15D4345:198a-42: shes ldan rta de rnyed na ni //
T15D4345:198a-43: nad kyis zil gnon mi 'gyur ro //
T15D4345:198a-44: lham bu chu shel 'dra ba la //
T15D4345:198a-45: sngar zhing yan lag lnga dkar ba //
T15D4345:198a-46: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
T15D4345:198a-47: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob //
T15D4345:198a-48: lus kyi mdog ni gzhan dra zhing //
T15D4345:198a-49: mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa yi //
T15D4345:198a-50: tha skar bu yi rta rnyed na //
T15D4345:198a-51: rta ni mang po rnyed par 'gyur //
T15D4345:198a-52: dkar dang gnag pa'i tshul gyis khra //
T15D4345:198a-53: g-yas logs dkar ba'i shas che la //
T15D4345:198a-54: g-yon pa khra bor gyur pa yi //
T15D4345:198b-0: rta ni khra bor rnyed @198b gyur na //
T15D4345:198b-1: rta de'i lha ni ngan spong ste //
T15D4345:198b-2: 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub yin //
T15D4345:198b-3: lham bu chu shel 'dra'i mdog la //
T15D4345:198b-5: drag po'i rta de rnyed na ni //
T15D4345:198b-7: de lta bu yi rgyal ba'i rta //
T15D4345:198b-8: rgyal po yi ni rtag tu bya //
T15D4345:198b-9: de yi gnas ni rta gzhan dag / gang dang yang ni gcig mi bya //
T15D4345:198b-10: ngo mtshar mdog dang ldan pa'i rta //
T15D4345:198b-11: dmod pas sa steng skyes pa yin //
T15D4345:198b-12: dri za'i bur ni shes kyis la //
T15D4345:198b-13: rab tu 'bad de bsnyen bkur bya //
T15D4345:198b-14: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las rgyal po'i bzhon
T15D4345:198b-15: pa'i rta'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
T15D4345:198b-17: / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T15D4345:198b-18: rta yi mig gi mtshan nyid do //
T15D4345:198b-19: gang zhig bee d'urya 'dra'i mdog / de bzhin shel gyi mdog 'dra dang //
T15D4345:198b-20: phug ron gyi ni mig 'dra dang //
T15D4345:198b-22: glang chen ma bya rnga mo dang //
T15D4345:198b-23: sreg pa'i mig dang 'dra ba dang //
T15D4345:198b-24: gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba nyid //
T15D4345:198b-25: de yi mig ni shes pa yin //
T15D4345:198b-26: skyon med pa yi mig la ni //
T15D4345:198b-27: rdzi ma phra mos khyab pa dang //
T15D4345:198b-28: mig 'dras legs shing ma snang la //
T15D4345:198b-29: thur du bltas par ma gyur pa //
T15D4345:198b-30: mdog ni bzang po dang ldan zhing //
T15D4345:198b-31: mig gi mdangs dang ldan pa'i rta //
T15D4345:198b-32: de ni g-yul las rgyal byed pa'i //
T15D4345:198b-33: rgyal ba yi ni bzhon par 'gyur //
T15D4345:198b-34: yangs shing snum la mnyam pa dang //
T15D4345:198b-35: me tog ma li ka 'dra dang //
T15D4345:198b-36: tha ma ring mo yod gyur cing //
T15D4345:198b-37: dbus na yongs su mdzes pa dag / rta de ma li ka'i mig can //
T15D4345:198b-38: mig zur cung zad gnag pa yin //
T15D4345:198b-40: rta dang mdzod kyang rgyas par 'gyur //
T15D4345:198b-41: dkar ba'am mdog rjes dkar gyur la //
T15D4345:198b-42: mig la skyon med mthong mig nag / rdzi ma mig dkyus nag gyur pa //
T15D4345:198b-43: gang la yod pa der nor skyed //
T15D4345:198b-44: mig ni shel du 'dra ba la //
T15D4345:198b-45: rgyal mo'i rtsa ba gnag gyur cing //
T15D4345:198b-46: mig gi rgyal mo rdul med pas //
T15D4345:198b-47: de ni shel mig can zhes bya //
T15D4345:198b-48: mig dang lus kyi mdog 'dra ba //
T15D4345:198b-49: mig gi mdog can zhes bya dge / kha dog lus dang tha dad kyang //
T15D4345:199a-2: mi sdug pa dang ma tshad med //
T15D4345:199a-3: de ni mig bzang nor 'phel byed //
T15D4345:199a-4: kha dog lus dang tha dad cing //
T15D4345:199a-5: smad par bya ba'i mig yod pa //
T15D4345:199a-6: mig ngan pa yi rta gang yin //
T15D4345:199a-7: las rnams kun la smad pa yin //
T15D4345:199a-8: de bas dbyibs dang tshad ldan zhing //
T15D4345:199a-9: dpe dang legs par 'dra ba dang //
T15D4345:199a-10: rdzi ma'i kha dog snum pa yi //
T15D4345:199a-11: mig gang yin pa de bsngags so //
T15D4345:199a-12: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las mig brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'o /
T15D4345:199a-14: // / bsgrub dang grub pa'i rig 'dzin gtso //
T15D4345:199a-15: drang srong gzi brjed chen po la //
T15D4345:199a-16: yon tan des kyis yongs dris pa //
T15D4345:199a-17: rta so'i rig byed mkhyen lags sam //
T15D4345:199a-18: de skad dris tshe drang srong mchog / sha li ho tra'i slar smras pa //
T15D4345:199a-19: rta so'i rig byed shes lags so //
T15D4345:199a-20: bu khyod kyis ni nyan par gyis //
T15D4345:199a-21: mdun so thams cad thags bzang snyoms //
T15D4345:199a-22: sra zhing mtshan ma rab tu gsal //
T15D4345:199a-23: snum pa'am sprang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba'i //
T15D4345:199a-24: rta yi so ni bsngags pa yin //
T15D4345:199a-25: mche ba so dang mdog 'dra dang //
T15D4345:199a-27: so rnams gting ring srab pa dang //
T15D4345:199a-28: ri mo phra zhing shin tu 'jam //
T15D4345:199a-29: gos ba med cing rtsa ba yi //
T15D4345:199a-30: mdog dang kun du 'dra ba shis //
T15D4345:199a-31: mnyam zhing yan lag rab tu 'byor //
T15D4345:199a-32: chu zheng tshad dang ldan pa dang //
T15D4345:199a-33: gzugs ni shin tu legs gyur ba'i //
T15D4345:199a-34: so ni bde ba skyed byed yin //
T15D4345:199a-35: so ni lhag pa yod pa'i rta //
T15D4345:199a-36: bdag po yul mi rnams la gnod //
T15D4345:199a-37: de bzhin so ni ma tshang ba //
T15D4345:199a-38: bdag po chung mar bcas pa rlag / so yis kha ni khengs gyur pa //
T15D4345:199a-39: rigs rlag byed pas spang bar byed //
T15D4345:199a-40: so rtsa so dang bcas pa ni //
T15D4345:199a-41: mi shis pa yi gzugs ldan zhing //

T15D4345:199a-44: bdag po'i nor ni rlag byed yin //
T15D4345:199a-45: mtho dman khyer dang sbom phra khyer //
T15D4345:199a-46: de bzhin phred ni rnam par spangs //
T15D4345:199a-47: mi mnyam med ces bya so de //
T15D4345:199a-48: bdag po'i bu ni gsod byed yin //
T15D4345:199a-49: rtse mo nang du grub pa yi //
T15D4345:199a-50: so ni nor rnams 'jig byed yin//
T15D4345:199b-0: @199b thams cad byung ba'i chag pa'am //

T15D4345:199b-9: ya so shin tu gyes gyur na //
T15D4345:199b-10: bdag po dgra las pham par 'gyur //

T15D4345:199b-17: mche ba dang ni 'gram so yi //

T15D4345:199b-28: gtsug rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni //

T15D4345:199b-30: gtsug rnams kyi ni dbyibs gyur pa //

T15D4345:199b-43: gtsug pa ji ltar 'byung ba lags //

T15D4345:199b-46: 'di na brtan dang mi brtan dang //

T15D4345:199b-49: tshan nyid rab tu shes par bya //
T15D4345:200a-2: thams cad lus la brten pa yin //
T15D4345:200a-3: lus las 'byung bar gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:200a-4: lus dang yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
T15D4345:200a-5: dge ba'i gnas su shas pa'i gtsug / rgya che ba yi 'bras bu ster //
T15D4345:200a-6: mi shis gnas ni ngan pa 'byung //
T15D4345:200a-7: shin tu mi shis skal chen 'gyur //
T15D4345:200a-8: tshad dang ldan zhing gsal bar byung //
T15D4345:200a-9: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i 'bras bu che //
T15D4345:200a-10: tshad mi ldan zhing mi gsal ba //
T15D4345:200a-12: gnas dang dbyibs kyi bye brag las //
T15D4345:200a-14: sor gnyis las lhag nya phyis te ;
T15D4345:200a-15: / sor gnyis pa ni lhag ces bya //
T15D4345:200a-16: shing lham 'dra dang rkang brgya ba //
T15D4345:200a-17: sor ni phyed dang gnyis pa yin //
T15D4345:200a-18: shing lham phyed ni nas drug zheng //
T15D4345:200a-19: 'dres pa sor ni brgyad pa yin //
T15D4345:200a-20: de yi cha gsum phri ba ni //
T15D4345:200a-21: 'khyil ba zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T15D4345:200a-22: bzhi cha phri bar gyur pa ni //
T15D4345:200a-23: kha 'bus pa zhes bya ba yin //

T15D4345:200a-25: gtsug ni 'bras bu med pa yin //
T15D4345:200a-26: pags srab spu ni phra ba dang //
T15D4345:200a-27: lus kyi gsang ba'i gnas su byung //

T15D4345:200a-29: tshad dang ldan rung mi ldan rung //
T15D4345:200a-30: 'bras bu bcas par shes par bya //
T15D4345:200a-31: phra ba de dag gnod byed yin //
T15D4345:200a-32: yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis //
T15D4345:200a-33: shis dang mi shis 'og nas bshad //
T15D4345:200a-34: rta yi gnas bcu'i spu tshogs la //
T15D4345:200a-35: bstan pa gang yin der shes bya //
T15D4345:200a-36: mchu sgros rngog mar re re dang //
T15D4345:200a-37: gtsug dang brad la gnyis gnyis te //
T15D4345:200a-38: rgyu zhabs rkub lhag gnyis gnyis te //

T15D4345:200a-40: kun nas rdzogs shing shin du gsal //
T15D4345:200a-41: gtsug ni g-yas su 'khyil ba dang //

T15D4345:200a-43: gser ltar mdangs snum 'od dang bcas //
T15D4345:200a-44: dbyibs ni legs par skyes pa dag / las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T15D4345:200a-45: legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas //
T15D4345:200a-46: drang srong de la slar smras pa //

T15D4345:200a-48: gzhan dag de ltar ma yin bshad //
T15D4345:200a-49: rta rnams skyes zin gyur nas ni //
T15D4345:200a-50: gtsug de nam yang mi skye la //
T15D4345:200b-1: skyes tshe lhan cig skye bar 'gyur //

T15D4345:200b-3: legs thos tshig ni thos pa dang //

T15D4345:200b-5: ji ltar phyogs der skyes gyur pa //
T15D4345:200b-6: de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa //
T15D4345:200b-7: pha mar yod dang med gyur kyang //
T15D4345:200b-8: cig shos la ni dbang ba yin //
T15D4345:200b-9: phal tsher gnas bcur dbang gyur gyi //
T15D4345:200b-10: de ltar gzhan du mi snang ngo //
T15D4345:200b-11: de bas bcu po bstan par bya //
T15D4345:200b-12: nges pa nyid du zung bar gyis //
T15D4345:200b-14: gzhan dag de ltar min par bshad //
T15D4345:200b-15: brtan dang mi brtan gang yin kyang //
T15D4345:200b-16: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
T15D4345:200b-17: gnas ni dgu bcu rtsa drug yin //
T15D4345:200b-18: dbyibs ni rgyal po nyid yin no //
T15D4345:200b-20: rkang ba brgya dang lhag pa dang //
T15D4345:200b-21: shing lham dang 'dra shin lham phyed / nya phyis 'dra ste rnam par brgyad //
T15D4345:200b-22: smad pa'am bsngags pa'i gnas dag gam //
T15D4345:200b-23: gnas su bstan dang ma bstan gang //
T15D4345:200b-24: gtsug 'khyil pa yi dbyibs byung na //

T15D4345:200b-26: 'khyil ba chu skor lta bu yin //
T15D4345:200b-27: nya phyis nya phyis dbyibs ltar 'ong //

T15D4345:200b-31: 'dus pa zhes ni bya bar bshad //

T15D4345:200b-33: bzlog pa ltar snang lhag pa yin //

T15D4345:200b-44: gtsug kyang gnas dang dbyibs dang ni //

T15D4345:200b-48: lhag pa 'am chad par gyur pa'am //
T15D4345:201a-0: dbyibs ngan mdog ni mi sdug pa / brtan po rnams ni mi snang @201a * //
T15D4345:201a-2: / smad pa'i gnas su g-yas 'khyil dang //

T15D4345:201a-4: mtshan nyid ngan pa yin zhes bya //

T15D4345:201a-10: bdun cu rtsa drug smad bya ste //

T15D4345:201a-12: kha 'gram la gnyis dbral bar bzhi //
T15D4345:201a-13: dpal mtshams la gcig kho na yin //
T15D4345:201a-14: rna rtsar gnyis te lkog mar gcig //

T15D4345:201a-21: nyi shu yin par rnam par bshad //
T15D4345:201a-22: gtsug ni 'di rnams gnyis la ni //

T15D4345:201a-31: 'byung ba sum cu drug / sna gdong mchu ltag
T15D4345:201a-32: srol mdud dang // dpung sna snying ga ze'u drug mdo //

T15D4345:201a-40: gtsug kyang bcu drug nyid yin no //

T15D4345:201a-44: gtsug ni rnam pa'ang brgyad yin no //
T15D4345:201a-45: mchu sgros de yi so gnyis te //

T15D4345:201a-48: de phyir dgu bcu drug gsal nas //

T15D4345:201b-0: smad @201b pa dag kyang bshad pa yin //

T15D4345:201b-5: mchu sgros steng dang g-yas kyis ni //

T15D4345:201b-9: mchu ltas gong du gtsug byung na //
T15D4345:201b-10: bdag po'i rigs dang bcas pa sreg / sna phor la ni g-yas pa yis //
T15D4345:201b-12: gang gi mkhur tshos gnyis ka la //
T15D4345:201b-13: gtsug 'khyil ba ni snang gyur na //

T15D4345:201b-15: rta yis za bar 'gyur ba yin //
T15D4345:201b-16: rta gdong 'gram dang sna gdong la //

T15D4345:201b-44: gsang 'phel ba yi nyes pa yis //
